Candy Faye is a responsible housewife who helps her husband in gaining income. She is 27 years old and blessed with five children; two of them are now attending school. They want them to earn a degree so that they can find a good job some day. 

She has been engaged in tailoring business for almost two years. She aims to continue to improve the business in order to generate a higher income. 

Due to inadequate capital, she wants to avail a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy threads, fabrics, and other accessories needed in her tailoring shop. Through this financial assistance, she believes that she will make more improvements in the business.

loans.use: to buy threads, fabrics, and other accessories needed.

location.town: Brgy. Inaban, Dupax del Norte,Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Luvuno

texts.en: Luvuno appreciates her previous Kiva loan, which improved her standard of living. She is requesting a new loan to purchase more goats for her business. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She thanks Yehu for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase more goats for her business.

loans.name: Kupha

texts.en:
Kupha is a very hardworking and enterprising woman who says that she has been able to greatly increase her income and help her family, thanks to her hard work.

Besides a shop kiosk, she also operates a business selling goats.

She is asking for a loan to purchase more goats for her business. She is grateful for the new support she has received.

loans.use: to purchase more goats for her business.

loans.name: Mbeyu

texts.en:
Mbeyu greatly appreciates Kiva lenders for supporting her business over the years. Through the extra income she has earned, she has managed to take good care of her family.

Mbeyu operates a charcoal selling business and she cites seasonality as her major challenge. She is requesting for a loan to purchase more sacks of charcoal for her business.

She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Gulzhan

texts.ru: Гульжан 56 лет, разведена, есть сын, который активно помогает по хозяйству. У Гульжан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1999 году с 50,000 сом (KGS), благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Гульжан, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 4 дойные коровы. Также имеется 2,66 ГА земельной доли, на которой она ежегодно выращивает фасоль для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Дополнительно Гульжан реализует молоко местным жителям. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гульжан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) для закупки минеральных удобрений и семян фасоли. Гульжан намерена получить хороший урожай со своего участка, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Гульжан планирует вложить в ремонт дома.
texts.en: Gulzhan is 56 years old, divorced, and has one son who actively helps her with her farm. Gulzhan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, she practices livestock breeding and crop farming. She started this business in 1999 with 50,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Gulzhan's perseverance and hard work, she currently has 4 milk cows on her farm. She also has a 2.66 hectare plot of land on which she annually grows beans for personal consumption and sale. Additionally, Gulzhan sells milk to local residents. Her monthly cumulative income is around 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of the further development of her business, Gulzhan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 35,000 som (KGS) to buy mineral fertilizers and bean seeds. Gulzhan is determined to receive a good harvest from her plot of land, which will fundamentally increase her family's capital. Gulzhan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in home repairs.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and bean seeds.

loans.name: Sandra  Irene

texts.es:
Sandra es una señora de 26 años, vive junto a sus tres hijitos en una humilde casa ubicada en San Gabriel, recinto de Santo Domingo de los Colorados.
Sus dos hijos mayores estudian en una escuelita cerca del sector, su nena de 2 años pasa con ella. 
Sandra es una madre muy trabajadora, a pesar que ha afrontado la vida sola con sus hijos a trabajado muy duro por el bienestar de los pequeños, cuenta con unas chancheras donde tiene los cerdos, mes a mes los vende en ferias, con este ingreso Sandra ha podido llevar el alimento a su hogar.
Sandra ya ha trabajado con Fundación Alternativa, está agradecida por la ayuda de los créditos. Ahora necesita ampliar su negocio, construir unas chancheras y comprar cerditos. Nuevamente solicita un pequeño crédito, agradece enormemente a la institución y a Kiva porque ha podido crecer en su negocio y mejorar  su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra, 26, lives with her three young children in a humble home in the Via San Gabriel in Santo Domingo de los Colorados. 
Her two older children are studying in school near their home. Her little 2-year-old girl stays with her.
Sandra is a hardworking mother, even though she has faced life alone with her children. She has worked hard for the welfare of her children. She has a pig farm where she raises pigs. Each month, she sells them in outdoor markets. With her income, Sandra brings food into the home.
Sandra has worked with Fundacion Alternativa. She is grateful for the help of loans. Now, she needs to expand her business buy building a pen and buying piglets. She is again applying for a small loan. She greatly appreciates the institution and Kiva because she has been able to grow her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to construct pig pens and purchase piglets.

loans.name: Chheng An

texts.en:
A resident from Kampong Cham province, Chheng An is 47 years old and a married mother blessed with five children. She is a local farmer who grows rice crops, farms sesame, and raises pigs, in addition to selling grocery items to supplement her income. She has been involved in her current business for 18 years. 

This is second loan for Chheng An with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely and it has enabled her to upgrade her lifestyle better than before, especially in keeping her kids in school. For this cycle, she is obtaining a new loan in order to buy more pigs for raising. She hopes that she can raise her pig healthily so that she can sell it with a good price.

loans.use: to buy more pigs for raising.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Sokha's Group

texts.en:
Sokha is 48 years old and a married mother blessed with four children. Two of her children are in school and one is too young for schooling. To earn a living, rice farming on one hectare of farmland and cassava farming are the only source of income for her, which generates about 34,000 KHR per day. 

This is the first loan for Sokha with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has formed a group of three to obtain a new loan. She is seeking 1,000,000 KHR for each loan member. As the group leader, Sokha will spend her entire loan portion to pay the plowing fee for her cassava crop and to buy cassava seedlings. She hopes that she can gain a good yield that will be better than in the past.

loans.use: to pay the plowing fee for her cassava crop and to buy cassava seedlings.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Khorn's Group

texts.en:
Khorn is 32 years old and a married mother blessed with two school-going children. For her, three hectares of rice crop farming and her paid work are the only source of income, which generates her about 38,000 KHR. In this group of four, Khorn is the leader. She and her joint borrowers have been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for at least three cycles, with a successful repayment. Now, her living condition is getting better than before. 

For this loan cycle, Khorn is seeking 1,400,000 KHR; it is the same loan amount as her co-borrowers. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crops, and to pay the plowing fee. She strongly hopes that she can earn more income than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her crops and to pay the plowing fee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get him a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Sreyda's Group

texts.en:
Sreyda is 29 years old, married and has two little kids. She is a resident of Moung Russey district of Battambang province, where her rice cropping is the only source of income. To supplement her income, she grows pineapples. 

Including this loan, she is a fourth-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely, and it has enabled her to uplift her lifestyle better than before. 

For this cycle, she leads a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop. She strongly believes that she can gain a good yield, better than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is an 18-year old high school graduate and lives in a village near Bago City. Jocelyn is the eldest child of a family of 6. Her father works as a farmer, and her mother is a housewife. The younger sisters are now in secondary school and the youngest brother is also studying at the local school. Her family’s total monthly income is only Php 5,000.00 ($111).The income is not enough to provide all their basic needs. Thus, when she qualified for the 2- month call center training program of BagoSphere, she saw a glimmer of hope—that there’s actually a chance for her to uplift her life in a few months.

Jocelyn dreams of having a high paying job and of helping her siblings finish school, and tuition loan assistance might just make her reach those.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Lisi

texts.en:
Lisi is a 49-year-old married woman with five children. She has a small garden where she grows eggplants, cucumbers and tomatoes that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years.

Lisi  needs a loan to buy chemicals, a backpack sprayer, vegetable seeds, a file spade, shovels, fertilizer, and a wheelbarrow. 

She has been a member of SBPD since 2013. Lisi will use the profits from her sales to support her family and to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a backpack sprayer, vegetable seeds, a file spade, shovels, fertilizer, and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Motiana

texts.en: Motiana is a 33-year-old woman with three children. She has a small peanut plantation, and sells peanuts in her community. Motiana needs a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, barbed wire, a rake, fertilizer and a garden hose. She hopes to use her profits to support her family and to improve her business. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, barbed wire, a rake, fertilizer and a garden hose.

loans.name: Autaele

texts.en: Autaele is a 49-year-old single woman with no children. She makes and sells ice cakes in her community to earn a living. She has two years of experience with this business. Autaele needs a loan to buy sugar, foam cups, plastic bags, Chinese lollies, cordials and a cooler. She plans to use her profits to improve her business and support her family. Autaele joined SPBD in 2014, in order to gain access in financial services.

loans.use: to buy sugar, foam cups, plastic bags, Chinese lollies, cordials and a cooler.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas De San Antonio Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Unidas de San Antonio es un grupo nuevo que esta con mucho entusiasmo para poder crecer y ayudar a sus familias por medio del sacrificio en conjunto. Ellas también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder conocer la situación de cada una y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
La Sra. Decilveria es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella es una mujer muy luchadora y por sobre todo muy emprendedora, que a través de su esfuerzo ha ido mejorando, y con lo cual viene ayudando a sus seres queridos. Ella se dedica a la panadería hace ya un buen tiempo, y gracias a eso se ha hecho de muy buena clientela que siempre compra de ella los panificados que tiene.
Hoy Decilveria solicita este préstamo para la compra de insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus panificados, como ser harina, manteca, levadura y demás. Agradece por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Mujeres Unidas de San Antonio (United Women of San Antonio) is a new group that has much enthusiasm for being able to grow and help their families through their overall sacrifice. They are also doing the survey on the elimination of poverty in order to understand the situation of each one and be able to work accordingly.

Señora Decilveria is one of the members of this group. She is a very hard-working woman and above all very entrepreneurial, who through her efforts has been progressing and helping her loved ones. She has been working in a bakery for a long time, and thanks to this, she has established a very good clientele that always buys from her the baked goods that she has.

Now Decilveria is applying for this loan for the purchase of supplies to be able to continue making her baked goods, such as flour, lard, leavening, and other supplies. She is grateful for the opportunity that they are receiving to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy flour, lard, leavening, and other supplies

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou est une promotrice qui évolue dans la commercialisation des produits cosmétiques et des parfums. Elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant agé de 3ans, elle gère sa mère qui vit avec elle et prend son enfant en charge car son mari ne travaille pas. Elle a une expérience de 5ans dans cette activité. Fatou demande ce prêt d'un montant de 75000F pour acheter des produits cosmétiques qu'elle vend au marché. Elle démarre sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 18h. Elle voudrait diversifier son activité à l'avenir et augmenter ses revenus afin de pouvoir garder de l'argent à coté et développer son commerce.
texts.en: Fatou is an entrepreneur who sells cosmetics and perfumes.  She is married and the mother of a three-year-old child.  She supports her own mother and her child, since her husband is not working.  She has been working in this field for five years.  She is taking a loan of 75,000 CFA francs to buy some cosmetics which she will resell at the market.  She works from 9AM until 6PM.  In the future, she would like to diversify her activity and increase her income in order to be able to save some money and develop her business.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and perfumes for resale.

loans.name: Fenix Group

texts.es:
Fenix se llama este grupo que está en su ciclo número 9 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde aparte de ello están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, con el cual pueden ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida y la de sus familias.
Una persona digna de destacar es la Sra. Maximina, quien se dedica a hacer comidas variadas como empandas, sándwich, tortillas y demás. Ella es una mujer muy hábil en lo que hace, y es por eso que le está dando todo lo que puede a su familia. Comenta que le gustaría poder tener un negocio bien grande donde podrá seguir ofreciendo todo tipo de alimentos a sus clientes.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar pan, huevos, jamón, queso, condimentos, carne y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
This group is called "Fenix" and is now on its ninth loan cycle as part of the women's committee programme. As well as being part of the women's committee programme, the members are also part of the poverty elimination project where they are able to improve their and their families' living conditions.

One good person in this group is Maximina who makes a living selling foods such as pastries, sandwiches, tortillas and more. She is a very skilled woman and is giving her family everything that she can. Maximina tells us that she would like to have a big business where she can continue to sell food to her customers.

Maximina is applying for this loan in order to buy bread, eggs, ham, cheese, condiments, meat and more. With these items she can continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy bread, eggs, ham, cheese, condiments, meat and more.

loans.name: Ivonne Patricia

texts.es: Ivonne de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de plásticos como guacales, vasos, paires, platos, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ivonne está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ivonne is 39 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She sells plastic products such as bowls, glasses, plates, etc. Her business is located in the market located near her home. With her earnings she can pay some household expenses. Ivonne is seeking a loan to buy more merchandise at wholesale to be able to continue with her business and in this way obtain greater profits and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy plastic merchandise at wholesale such as bowls, glasses, plates, etc.

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr:
Ablavi est une femme âgée de 37ans. Elle est mariée à un frigoriste. Revendeuse depuis 2010, elle mène son petit commerce de produits alimentaires à la maison.  Elle  aide à gérer les dépenses du ménage. Ablavi  offre une variété de produits alimentaires à des prix raisonnables et grâce à cela ,a conservé ses nombreux clients. 

Pour augmenter son stock, Ablavi demande un prêt  un prêt de 250000FCFA, qu'elle utilisera pour acheter des produits alimentaires (riz,  sucre, la farine sur le marché  des grossistes….). De cette façon, elle sera en mesure de répondre systématiquement à la demande croissante de ses clients. Elle souhaite utiliser une partie de ses revenus pour augmenter son capital et pouvoir  s’autofinancer à l’avenir.
texts.en:
Ablavi is 37 years old and married to a refrigeration mechanic.  She has been working as a reseller of food products since 2010 and she manages her own small retail business from home.  She supports her husband in the management of the household expenses.  Ablavi sells a variety of food products and her prices are reasonable, which has helped her to build a regular customer-base.

In order to increase her stock of merchandise, Ablavi is requesting a loan of 250,000 CFA francs which will be used to buy staple food products (rice, sugar, flour) at the wholesale market.  This will allow her to better meet her customers' increasing demand.  Ablavi wishes to use part of her income to increase her capital and to be financially independent one day.

loans.use: to buy staple food products (sugar, rice, flour etc.).

loans.name: Mujeres Virtuosas Group

texts.es:
Este es un grupo bastante grande, que viene trabajando de manera unida, y todas se están ayudando, además de eso están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, un medio que les permitirá conocer en qué situación está cada una y conforme a ello poder seguir creciendo en el emprendimiento de cada una.
Ricarda es integrante de este grupo, y también es la presidenta, y comenta que siempre trata de ayudar a sus amigas y las incentiva a poder seguir luchando y creciendo. Ricarda está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para que a través de su despensa pueda ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
Pide este préstamo ya que necesita comprar verduras, carne, enlatados, panificados y demás, y de esa forma seguir luchando por mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This is a rather large group that has been working together in unity, and all the women in the group are helping one another. They are also participating in the poverty elimination survey, which will allow them to understand the situation that each woman is in so that they can each use the results to continue to grow as entrepreneurs. 

Ricarda is a member of this group, and is also the president. She says that she always tries to help her friends, who motivate her to continue to fight and grow. Ricarda is trying her hardest to improve her living conditions and those of her family through her neighborhood store. 

She is requesitng this loan to buy vegetables, meat, canned goods, bread and other items, so that she can continue to fight to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, canned goods, bread and other items

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.en:
Gilberto is 32 years old, and a simple man living in Baggao with his wife and four children. To make a living, he grows crops, particularly corn, to sell. From his last harvest, he generated just enough income for his family's sustenance. That is why he is now asking for additional capital of 15,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. This will help develop his farming output and help him to earn more profits, too. 

Someday he hopes to keep improving his crop production so he will be able to sustain his children's expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Leny

texts.en:
Leny is a hardworking mother who owns and manages a small retail store within the rural community. She is 45, married and blessed with six children. She and her husband are aiming for happiness and success in order to give their children a bright future. 

To attain their goals, Leny wants to improve her retail store in order to generate a higher income. She wants to avail a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy additional stock of canned goods, beverages, noodles, laundry soaps, snack foods, assorted candies, seasonings and soft drinks to sell. Through this loan, she believes that she will improve more of her business

loans.use: to buy additional stock of canned goods, beverages, noodles, laundry soaps, snack foods, assorted candies, seasonings and soft drinks to sell.

location.town: Brgy. Inaban, Dupax del Norte,Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: San Judas Tadeo Pisac Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SAN JUDAS TADEO PISAC”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Pisac, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dina ella es soltera y tiene 45 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de restaurant, la socia prepara diferentes platos como pollo con papas, sopas y saltados de carnes, la socia trabaja desde las 10:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, carne y verduras.

La socia que esta tapada con un circulo su rostro ya no pertenece al banco comunal San Judas Tadeo Pisac.
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the community bank "San Judas Tadeo Pisac." This bank is located in the district of Pisac in the province of Calca and the department of Cusco. 

Dina is a member. She is single and 45 years old. She works in her restaurant. She prepares different dishes such as chicken with potatoes, soup, and sauteed meats. She works from 10:00 AM until 5:00 PM. The member has had this restaurant for seven years and it has gone very well. Her dream is to expand her restaurant. She is applying for a loan in order to buy ingredients for cooking like chicken, meat, and vegetables. 

The member whose face is covered no longer belongs to the community bank "San Judas Tadeo Pisac."

The other members are dedicated to businesses selling vegetables, selling animals, selling groceries, and restaurants. 
 
Dina thanks those who form part of her dream through this program and promises to make her loan payments during the established term.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for cooking like chicken, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is 50 years old, married and has four grown-up children. Her spouse is a driver, while she is operating a store daily and earns about PHP 500 each day. She uses her income as revolving capital in her business. 

In her store, she sells biscuits, eggs, breads and soap. She would like to increase her merchandise; that is why she is asking for additional capital of PHP 35,000 to buy canned goods, eggs, breads, biscuits, noodles, soap and shampoo to sell. This way, it will help increase her capacity of sales; thus it will give her profitable income. 

She will save her revenues for her family's emergency expenses.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, eggs, breads, biscuits, noodles, soap and shampoo to sell.

loans.name: Julie Ann

texts.en: Julie Ann thought that its time for her house to be repaired. At the age of 25, single and an enterprising woman from Oroquieta City, Julie Ann took the courage to approach PMPC for financial assistance. As a bread winner to her family, she sees to it that her parents will be provided for, including a comfortable living. She hopes to purchase housing materials, such as hollow blocks and cement, so their kitchen can be repaired.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials, such as hollow blocks and cement.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.en:
Domingo is a farmer who grows rice and corn. At the age of 62 and married, he busies himself to provide for his family. He has cultivated a small parcel of land in Taboc Sur, Oroquieta City. For this cropping season, he applied for a loan to pay for land preparation and seedbed.

Domingo hopes to have a good harvest, to save more and to continually provide for his family.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation and seedbed.

loans.name: Anzazi

texts.en:
Anzazi is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past two years, Anzazi has operated a retail shop, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the loan, she wants to purchase bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans in order to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Silvia Miladis

texts.es:
Silvia, requiere un nuevo crédito que invertirá en la compra de semilla de marañón por mayoreo, pues planea aprovechar la temporada de la fruta y adquirirla a menor precio, con  ello tendrá suficiente materia prima para abastecer a sus clientes y aumentar sus ingresos.
El préstamo anterior le fue de mucha ayuda para contar con la materia prima por un buen tiempo, su negocio se mantiene activo, con las nuevas ganacias ha logrado cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Silvia requires a new loan that she will invest in buying cashew seed at wholesale as she is planning to take advantage of the growing season and acquire it at a better price. With it she will have enough product to supply her customers and increase her income.

The previous loan was much help in being able to count on the supplies in time. Her business is very active, and with the new earnings she has been able to cover the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy cashew seed at wholesale.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie labors a lot in her fish selling activities. At the age of 52 and as a single woman, she stands as the bread winner for her family. She withstands the trials of having a business and credits the start up capitalization with PMPC as her financing partner.

Melanie is able to maintain a status of member in good standing having no records of default. In need of capital, she approached PMPC to purchase more kilos of fish to resell. Melanie is expanding her area of operation to neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase more kilos of fish for resale.

loans.name: Jonathan Stiven

texts.es:
Jonathan Stiven es un joven muy activo, siempre esta pensando en el futuro, por eso quiere contar con el convenio Kiva, ya que le sirve de gran ayuda para los estudios, quiere continuar capacitandoce ya que es una persona que le gusta el estudio, le gusta salir a delante.
Es un joven dinámico, emprendedor, quiere capacitarse para tener un mejor futuro de vida una mejor estabilidad económica ser un profesional.
Quiere estudiar en campo alto por que facilita los estudios, la metodología de aprendizaje es muy didáctica y le gusta estudiar allí.
texts.en:
Jonathan Stiven is a very active young man, always thinking about his future. For this reason, he would like to depend on this agreement with Kiva, because it will be a great help for his studies. He wants to continue getting qualifications since he is a person who likes to study and likes to get ahead.  

He is a dynamic, enterprising young man, who wants to get training to have a better future in life, better economic stability, and to be a professional.

He wants to study at CampoAlto because it facilitates his studies, the learning methods are very educational, and he likes to study there.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester

loans.name: Taalaigul

texts.ru: Таалайгул 31 год, замужем, есть маленький ребенок. Супруг помогает по хозяйству. У Таалайгул - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она с 2010 года занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Таалайгул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 5 дойных коров и 200 овец. Зимой скот содержится в сарае, летом выводят на джайлоо. Дополнительно Таалайгул занимается торговлейв собственном магазине, товарооборот составляет 42,000 сом (KGS). Совокупный ежемесячный доход Таалайгул составляет 25,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 85,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Таалайгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также в будущем намерена сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en: Taalaigul is 31 years old, married and has a young child. Her husband helps her with her business. Taalaigul has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, she has been practicing livestock breeding since 2010. Thanks to Taalaigul's hard work, she currently has 5 milk cows and 200 sheep on her farm. In the winter, she keeps her cattle in her barn. In the summer, she brings them out to pasture. Additionally, Taalaigul works in retail sales in her own shop. Her sales turnover is 42,000 som (KGS). Taalaigul's cumulative monthly income is 25,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of the further development of her business, she turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 85,000 som (KGS) to buy calves to fatten up and resell at the market for a high price. Taalaigul plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She is also determined to make renovations on her home in the future.

loans.use: to buy calves to fatten up and resell at the market for a high price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, pesticide and pay labor to begin growing corn and beans and prepare a wire fence.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
El joven Luis Fernando, tiene 15 años de edad, estudia actualmente en el colegio santo Toribio de Mongrovejo, se encuentra en el grado décimo, a Fernando en el colegio le pedían como requisito para graduarse de bachillerato estar o haber estudiado una carrera técnica, debido a esto Fernando decidió buscar una carrera técnica con relación a la salud, ya que  tiene como proyecto de vida estudiar como carrera profesional Medicina y se interesó con ser Auxiliar de Medicina, el busco opciones como el S.E.N.A pero debido a los extensos horarios intervenía con el colegio de Fernando, días después en el salón de clase  tenía la información de que en la institución de Campo Alto, tenían un portafolio de carreras técnicas  que incluía  el Auxiliar de Enfermería, tenía una buena reputación como institución educativa y contaba con la facilidad de tener los semestres financiados, sin duda alguna él  se inscribió, actualmente  está a poco tiempo de terminar el primer semestre, satisfecho con la educación  que le ofrece campo alto.


Luis Fernando tiene como finalidad obtener cada conocimiento que le pueda ofrecer la carrera técnica en Auxiliar de Enfermería  con la finalidad de ayudar a otras personas cuando el nivel de salud o la vida se encuentren en peligro, ejercer el conocimiento aprendido para dar una buena ayuda al momento de ejercer el trabajo. 

Él también  quiere terminar el bachillerato satisfactoriamente  en el colegio donde actualmente se encuentra Fernando, tiene como una meta estudiar en una universidad, estudiar la carrera profesional en medicina, debido a que a él le apasiona y le gustaría salvar vidas, ayudar a todas la personas, curarlas  y generarles una vida sana y sin complicaciones.

El convenio con kiva sería de gran ayuda ya que como se encuentra estudiando en el colegio los gastos que tiene en el colegio más lo que se le presentan en campo alto son un poco difíciles de pagar, el estaría completamente satisfecho para que kiva le pudiera colaborar  y el pago de las cuotas le quedara un poco más económico.
texts.en:
The young Luis Fernando is 15 years old. He is now studying at the Santo Toribio de Mongrovejo school. He is in the 10th grade. As a requirement for graduation, the school has asked Fernando to be in or to have studied a technical course. Because of this, Fernando decided to look for a technical class related to health, since he has a life plan to study for a professional medical career, and he is interested in being a medical assistant. He looked for options such as those at SENA, but because the extensive hours interfered with Fernando's school, some days later in the classroom he received the information that in the Campo Alto institution, they had a portfolio of technical programs that included Nursing Assistant, it had a good reputation as an educational institution, and it has the facility to have semesters financed. Without any hesitation, he enrolled. Now he is about to finish his first semester, satisfied with the education that Campo Alto offers him.

Luis Fernando aims to obtain all the knowledge that the technical program for Nursing Assistant can offer him, with the goal of helping other people when their level of health or life is in danger, to exercise the knowledge he has learned in order to give good help at the moment of doing his work.

Fernando also wants to finish his high school degree satisfactorily in the school that he now attends. He has a goal of studying at a university, studying for a professional career in medicine, because he is passionate about it and would like to save lives, help everyone, cure them, and give them a healthy life without complications. 

The agreement with Kiva will be a great help, since as he is studying in secondary school, the expenses that he has in school in addition to what he has at Campo Alto are a little difficult to pay. He would be completely satisfied if Kiva would be able to help him, and the payment of the bills would be a little more economical for him.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school fees

loans.name: Passionate Ladies Group

texts.en:
Patience, 26, is the chairperson of the Passionate Ladies group, which consists of ambitious and hardworking ladies. The group came together when they identified the need for financial advice in their businesses before approaching Thrive. They then started attending business training offered at Thrive and this has since helped the group to manage their working capital through keeping financial records as well as working together in groups.
Patience is a single, hardworking and self motivated woman who started hair dressing business in 2008. She stays with her little sister whom she is paying school fees for. Patience wants to develop her salon business by stocking braids, weaves, hair chemicals which helps in attracting her customers as they will not be troubled going around looking for them. With a Kiva loan, Patience can achieve her objectives which indeed can help her increase her profit levels.

loans.use: To buy braids, weaves, hair treatments and other products to sell from her salon.

loans.name: Hupfumumba Group

texts.en:
Loveness`s husband died in 2002 when their first born child was 2 years old. However, she was not disheartened by the death of her husband. She started selling tomatoes and vegetables a year later. From the proceeds, she has managed to look after her daughter, now 16 years old, paying fees and medical bills. In 2010, she managed to get a passport and started procuring clothes and shoes from South Africa and Botswana for resale in Zimbabwe. Each and every tobacco season, she sells clothes and shoes to farmers. She also supplies clothes and shoes in her neighborhood.
Other women in Kambuzuma, Harare, were she stays, felt encouraged with how Loveness was managing as a widow. After approaching her, they formed the Hupfumumba group. The group continually attends trainings for business development offered at Thrive. The trainings have since helped the group to come up with good way of managing their businesses, in spite of hardship of the economy.
A loan with Kiva can help Loveness boost her business as she wish to be a prominent business woman in her society.

loans.use: To buy clothes and shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase toys, telephone accessories and other stock to sell from her shop.

loans.name: Ferdinand's Group

texts.en:
Ferdinand is 67 years old and a father of 6; he currently lives with his wife and 2 grandsons. Ferdinand and his wife own and operate a local equipped palm oil processing mill and majority of his mill users are widows. Annually Ferdinand and his mill users process palm oil for the local market. One of the major challenges he is facing now is storage facility. The old storage container he has been using is fast rusting away and sometimes contaminates his final products.  

Ferdinand is requesting this loan from Nke-Anyi Farmers Multipurpose Cooperative Society which he is also a member of to enable him purchase plastic storage containers.

Ferdinand is a very mild person and loves to encourage and help the needy within his village, which makes him well-spoken off by relatives and other members of his village.
Ferdinand currently supports his grand sons in Secondary school and hopes that soon he will be able to modernize his mill through Nke-Anyi FMCS mills equipment loan.

The group thanks all those who lovingly contributes to their loan.

loans.use: to purchase plastic storage tanks to store palm oil products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding cacao trees.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en: Rosemarie, 55, is married to Florentino and they have seven grown-up children. With the help of her husband, they have managed the farm for seven years. Aside from farming, Rosemarie is also managing the daily needs of her family. Rosemarie is a very patient mother and wife. All she wants is to provide for the needs of her family. She is asking for a loan amounting to 20,000 PHP to buy two sacks of rice seed, fertilizer and pesticide for her farming business.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of rice seed, fertilizer and pesticide for her farming business.

loans.name: Al- Tawaman* Group

texts.en:
Al-Tawaman* is a group that is comprised of five women from Sana'a, Yemen. They are requesting a loan of 250,000 YER from AMB.
Asma is the leader of the group. She is a 31-year-old married woman, and she has two children. Her oldest child is 11 years old, and the youngest one is 7 years old. Asma studied until the elementary school, but she couldn't complete her studies.  Asma's husband is an employee, as a soldier in the army. The salary which he receives from this work is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family.  Asma says that her house lacks a refrigerator, and she can't afford this.  Inside the kitchen of her house, Asma keeps many kinds of drinks and sweets that they need to be in a cold condition. Particularly, when the climate becomes very hot in the summer season. Unfortunately, she doesn't have a refrigerator in order to keep all the drinks in that condition. This thing affects most negatively the drinks. As a result, most of those items expire quickly. So, she puts them in the litter bin. To avoid this waste, Asma is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB, which she will use to purchase a refrigerator to keep the drinks and water in a cold condition in the house. 
Asma looks forward to improving the living conditions of her family.  She hopes to open a savings account in AMB.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator for her family.

loans.name: Sope Serigne Fallou Touba Yagne Group

texts.fr: le groupement sope serigne fallou est un composé de 10 personnes dont 8 femmes et 2 hommes qui habitent tous dans le meme quartier et font la meme activité. Astou est leur présidente c'est la 4ème personne de droite vers la gauche. Elle évolue dans le commerce des fruits et légumes et demande ce montant pour renforcer son commerce. Elle est mariée et mère de famille qui a une expérience de plus de 8 ans dans cet activité. Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Elle démarre la journée à 9h pour la terminer à 20h. A l'avenir, elle souhaite développer son commerce et augmenter ses revenus afin de pouvoir épargner de l'argent.
texts.en: The Sope Serigne Fallou group is made up of 10 members -- eight women and two men -- who all live in the same neighborhood and are involved in the same activity.  Astou, the group's representative, is the fourth person from the right in the photo.  She sells fruits and vegetables and is taking a loan to boost her business.  She has more than eight years of experience in her field of work.  She is also married and has a family.  She supports her husband with the management of the day-to-day expenses and with the payment of the children's school fees.  She works from 9AM until 8PM.  In the future, she would like to develop her business and increase her income in order to be able to save some money.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, fertilizer, etc. and to improve the land.

loans.name: Donatus's Group

texts.en:
Donatus is 50 years old and a father of 6; he lost his wife 3 years ago and since then has the responsibility of caring for the entire needs of his family. After the death of his wife, he joined Nke-Anyi Farmers Multipurpose Cooperative Society and also resigned from been a commercial motorcycle rider considering its high accident risk and started palm oil processing business. This has giving him more opportunity to stay close to his children.

With this loan, Donatus hopes to store more palm oil this season so as to increase his income, this will help him to meet up with his family responsibility, especially that of paying his children school fees. In the future he hopes to purchase a Tricycle locally known as “Keke Nepepe” to use it in transporting his products.

Donatus and his group members thanks all those who lovingly contributes to their loan

loans.use: to process and store palm oil products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more grocery products and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Emmanuel's Group

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 42 years old and a father of 4; he teaches at the village primary school and also he is a farmer. He inherited some portion of land from his father, this lands has numerous palm plantation on it. Annually Emmanuel and his wife engage in harvesting and processing of palm oil for the local market and the proceeds is used to support their family. As the family grows, more responsibility is added to the family income which has made it impossible for them to make any savings. What attributes to this is some years his palm trees yields very poor possible because the same land is also used to farm cassava and cocoa yam.

Emmanuel is requesting this loan from Nke-Anyi Farmers Multipurpose Cooperative Society which he is also a member of to enable him purchase more palm fruits and process more palm oil for this season so as to meet up with his family responsibility.

Teaching in rural schools in Nigeria is almost a voluntary task, considering the salary paid is to small and most at times teachers has to go without salary for several months. This has been the case with Emmanuel. Other members of his group are also teachers who are engage in palm oil processing to support their little earn salary.

Emma and his group members thanks all those who lovingly contributes to their loan.

loans.use: to purchase more palm fruits and process more palm oi

loans.name: Miguel Ángel .

texts.es:
Miguel Ángel se llama el señor de 71 años de edad que habita en el municipio de Achuapa departamento de león, una ciudad donde existen diversas actividades comerciales.

Miguel Ángel Es una señor luchador con deseos de mejorar las condiciones de vida familiar, tiene 70 años de edad, con 4 hijos bajo su cargo, con lo poco que el gana a duras penas ayuda a mantener el sustento diario a su Familia que tanto ama y estima. 

Desde hace 15 años ejerce el trabajo como conductor en una de las instituciones del estado, pero son de sus sueños tener una vida mejor con sus hijos.
 
Es de su gran necesidad que Ceprodel y Kiva le financie un crédito, para la compra de: Zinc, Arena y Cemento esto lo ve de gran importancia para poderle mejorar las condiciones del techito de su vivienda ya que se le aproxima las lluvias del invierno y no quiere mirarse afectado con su familia.  

Se siente a gusto con este tipo de empleo porque le ha ayudado mucho, Agrádese a Dios por haberse encontrado a kiva y Ceprodel porque estos le dan la oportunidad de seguir luchando es su vida familiar
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel lives in the town of Achuapa, department of León. It is a city that has diverse commercial activity.

Miguel Ángelis a fighter who wants the best conditions for his family life. He is 70 years old and has 4 children. With what little he earns he is barely able to support his family, whom he loves and esteems so much. For 15 years, he has worked as a driver in a state institution, but one of his dreams is to have a better life with his children.

He really needs Ceprodel and Kiva too give him a loan so that he can buy zinc sheeting, sand and cement. This is very important so that he can improve the roof on his house, because the winter rains are coming and he doesn't want to be affected by it with his family.  

He likes this type of work because it has helped him a lot. He thanks God that he found Kiva and Ceprodel because they are giving him the opportunity to keep fighting for his family.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting, sand and cement.

loans.name: Helen Jazmina

texts.es:
El Jiacaral es un pequeño Municipio donde existen personas emprendedoras con deseo de superar en su vida. 

Helen Jazmín Es una joven de 35 años de edad madre soltera cuenta con tres hijo bajo su cargo, con lo poco que ella gana a duras penas ayuda a mantener el sustento diario a sus tres hijitos que tanto ama y estima, uno de ellos estudia en la educación primaria. 

Trabaja en una empresa de estado como responsable de registro sibil, teniendo 3 años de laborar bajo este cargo.

Hoy en día se dio la oportunidad de Conocer a Ceprodel y Kiva a Través de una promoción de crédito, se dio cuenta cual era la función y quedo encantada con el tipo de información que Ceprodel y Kiva le podía ayudar en un pequeño financiamiento Para la construcción de un pequeño dormitorio en su vivienda.

Viendo la necesidad que presenta, su familia va creciendo cada día mas y necesita mas espacio en su viviendita y debido a la información se dirigió con toda amabilidad a la oficina de ceprodel a solicitar un pequeño préstamo para la compra de: Zin, Cemento Y Ladrillo esto sería para ella una bendición de Dios de Poder construir un anexo más a su vivienda.   

 Agrádese a Dios de Todo corazón por a verse encontrado con Kiva Y Ceprodel Para que esto le brinde este pequeño crédito que le ayudara mucho en su vida familiar.
texts.en:
El Jiacaral is a small municipality where there are many hard-working people with the desire to succeed in life.

Helen Jazmín is 35 years old, a single mother with three children. With the little she earns working hard she helps support her children daily, whom she loves and esteems very much. One of her children is in elementary school. She has worked in a government business as a civil registrar for 3 years.

Today she has the opportunity through Ceprodel and Kiva for a loan. She realized what this opportunity meant for her and was grateful for the information from Ceprodel and Kiva to be able to help her with a small loan to build a small bedroom on her home. Seeing the need that she has, her family is growing bigger every day and they need more space in the small modest home and thanks to the information that Ceprodel kindly provided she is seeking a loan to buy sheet metal, cement, and brick. This will be a blessing from God to be able to build an addition on her home. She thanks God with all her heart to have found Kiva and Ceprodel and for giving her this small loan that will help her family's life so much.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, cement and brick.

loans.name: Claudia Del Carmen

texts.es: Claudia tiene 20 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida. Ella es una joven trabajadora quien se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos. Junto a su compañero de vida se ganan la vida y mantienen la economía del hogar. Claudia solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea invertir en la construcción de un cuarto en su vivienda para lo cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y  hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así comenzar la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Claudia is 20 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner. She is a young, hardworking woman who earns her living through offering domestic services. With her life partner they earn their living and support the household economy. 

Claudia is asking for this loan from FUSAI as she wants to invest in constructing a bedroom in her house. She will need materials such as: bricks, cement, sand and iron. She hopes that she can count on this financing and so start construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Jose De Los Angeles

texts.es: El señor José, muy trabajador y responsable, el sustenta a su familia, tiene su propio negocio de Carpintería, donde realiza encargos de clientes que llegan a elaborar sus muebles, el solicita este crédito para la compra de una Maquina Cepilladora Eléctrica para poder realizar así mejor su trabajo y sus artículos podrán ser de mejor calidad, Don José muy agradecido por el apoyo que recibe de Kiva y Afodenic, con este crédito sus ganancias mejoraran y su familia mejorara sus condiciones.
texts.en:
José Flores is very hard-working and responsible, and he supports his family.  He has his own carpentry business where he makes the furniture that the customers order.

He is requesting the loan to buy an electric planer machine.  He wants to do this in order to be able to improve his work and so that the items he makes are able to be a better quality.  José is very grateful for the support he is getting from Kiva and AFODENIC.  With this loan his profits will improve and his family conditions will improve.

loans.use: to buy an electric planer.

loans.name: Dúo Bien Aventurados Group

texts.es:
Dúo MUJERES BIENAVENTURADAS
Este dúo formado por doña Francisca, de 65 años de edad, es viuda y todos sus hijos ya están casados, ella vive sola y trabaja para sostenerse, ella vende aguas gaseosas, huevos por cartón, también vende canastas en su casa, desde hace 30 años, ella solicita este crédito porque tiene el sueño de poner una su tienda de productos comestibles en su casa pero no cuenta con suficiente capital, ya que lo que tiene lo vuelve a invertir y saca para su alimentación, y pago de sus servicios,
texts.en: The Mujeres Bienaventuradas (Blessed Women) duo was formed by Doña Francisca, who is 65 years old. She tells us that she is a widow and all her children are married. She lives alone and works to support herself. She sells soda water and eggs by the box. She has also been selling baskets in her house for 30 years. She is applying for this loan because she has the dream of setting up a grocery store in her house, but she doesn't have sufficient capital, since what she has, she again invests and uses for her food and to pay for her services.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell

loans.name: Dúo Lirio De Los Balles De Sacatepequez Group

texts.es:
DÚO LIRIO DE LOS BALLES DE SACATEPEQUEZ
Este dúo está formado doña Alba Leticia, de 38 años de edad, es casada y tiene un hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de granizadas en el parque de San Juan Sacatepéquez, desde hace 10 años y también vende papas fritas, ella solicita este crédito porque su máquina de granizadas ya está un poco mala y necesita comprar una nueva, también quiere comprar otros ingredientes, ya que ha salido variedad de granizadas y ella quiere surtir, también quiere comenzar a vender pollo frito junto con las papas ya que le piden y por falta de capital ella no ha podido invertir, por eso espera que kiva la pueda apoyar, ya que ella necesita ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de su hijo que es especial y lo llevan a rehabilitación todas las semanas.
texts.en:
Lirio de los Valles de Sacatepequez Duo

This duo includes Alba Leticia, age 38.  She is married and has a child. She has worked selling slushies in the San Juan Sacatepéquez park for ten years.  She also sells fries.  

She is asking for this loan because her slushy machine is a little bit bad and she needs to buy a new one.  She also wants to buy other ingredients because she has run out of a variety of slushies and she wants to stock up.  She also wants to begin to sell fried chicken with her fries because people ask for it but, due to a lack of capital, she hasn’t been able to invest in that.  Because of this, she hopes that Kiva will help her.  

She needs to help her husband with her child’s expenses because her child has special needs and they take him to rehab every week.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make and sell slushies and fried chicken.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn by the quintal, and lime powder

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel 30 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su madre, Daniel posee un taller de carpintería en el cual fabrica y vende variedad de muebles. Tiene 7  años de dedicarse al negocio y gracias a Dios y a su dedicación ha logrado mantenerlo en marcha. Muchas personas lo prefieren ya que él ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus muebles. Últimamente los clientes han aumentado y cada día la demanda es mayor. Su sueño es poder ver florecer su negocio y sabe que para eso tiene que invertir un poco más en la producción de tal forma que logre cubrir toda la demanda. Para esto ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de madera, clavos, pega, barniz, junco y de más artículos que logren atraer a más clientes de tal forma que pueda logra su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida junto con su madre.
texts.en:
Daniel is 30 years old and lives in a relative’s house with her mother. Daniel has a wood workshop where he makes and sells furniture.

He has been working in his business for 7 years. Thanks to God and to his dedication, he has been able to keep it running.
Many customers prefer him because he offers quality and good prices in his furniture. Lately, his customers have grown and the demand for his products is bigger every day. His dream is to see his business flourish, and he knows that, in order to achieve it, he needs to invest in the production and cover the demand.

This is why he has applied for a loan at INTEGRAL to invest in his business, buying wood, nails, glue, varnish, reed and other items that will attract more customers and bring him closer to his goal of improving his quality of life and his mother’s.

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, glue, varnish, reed and other items.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro es un pequeño agricultor que habita en zona rural, cumple el sueño de trabajar la tierra de forma sostenible como lo hace su familia. Él tiene buenas expectativas con la producción y comercialización del cacao para este y los próximos años, ya que según la experiencia adquirida en este rubro es un cultivo de mucho valor económico. Alejandro trabaja a lado de su esposa que se dedica a las labores de la finca, cuido de sus dos hijos y el manejo administrativo del personal, juntos esperan cumplir con los objetivos y metas planteadas y poder garantizar el patrimonio para sus hijos en un futuro. Él solicita el crédito con el cual dará mejores condiciones a su parcela de cacao, la cual necesita de inversión en fertilizantes, manejo de plagas y limpieza manual de su parcela de cacao.
texts.en:
Alejandro Soza is a small farm owner who lives in a rural area and realizes his dream of working the land in a sustainable fashion as his family does.  He has good expectations for the production and commercialization of his cocoa crop for this and the coming years, because according to his expertise it is a very profitable business.

Alejandro works with his wife who does farm chores, cares for their two children and manages employees.  Together they meet their goals to guarantee that their children will have patrimony in the future.  He is requesting a loan to improve his cocoa field and will buy fertilizers and pest control, and hire workers to manually clean the field.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pest control, and to hire workers to clean his cocoa field.

loans.name: Juana Haydee

texts.es:
Confección  y estilo, Juana conoce a la perfección  esta labor. Cuenta con  28 años de experiencia  elaborando sus propios diseños, también conoce  las últimas  tendencias de la moda  a nivel nacional e internacional por las revistas que sus clientes le llevan a menudo. Su madre la motivó a seguir esta profesión de modista y le enseño las técnicas necesarias para fabricar ropa de alta costura. 
Aunque  cuenta con los ingresos de su esposo e hijos, siempre ha optado por trabajar y ser independiente, sin embargo, en algunas ocasiones  el dinero no es suficiente, por lo que Juana decidió recurrir a un financiamiento en KIVA MiCrédito  para la compra de los materiales que utiliza en sus confecciones, como botones, agujas y telas.  Su visión a futuro es poder ver sus diseños en tiendas o mercados.
texts.en:
If we talk about sewing and style, Juana knows this line of work perfectly.  With 28 years of experience sewing her own designs, she also knows the latest trends and styles at a national and international level through the magazines that her clients often bring her.  Her mother inspired her to follow this profession as a fashion designer and taught her the techniques necessary to create high fashion clothing.

Although she can count on the income of her husband and children, she has always chosen to work and be independent.  Nevertheless, on some occasions her money isn’t enough, so Juana has decided to resort to a loan with Kiva and MiCrédito to buy the materials that she uses in her creations, such as buttons, needles, and fabric.  Her vision for the future is to be able to see her designs in stores or markets.

loans.use: to buy materials that she uses in her sewing, such as buttons, needles, and fabric.

loans.name: Claudia Lucia

texts.es:
La pulpería de Claudia se ha vuelto muy popular en su barrio. Todos los días atiende a sus clientes con una amabilidad, cualidad que se caracteriza en ella. Su hijo formó parte de este proyecto,  ya que por él estableció su negocio, con el fin de compartir más tiempos juntos en su hogar.
Claudia ha conseguido muy buenos ingresos gracias a las ventas y quiere continuar ese ritmo. Ella  quiere aumentar su inventario y  no sufrir escasez alguna. Por lo que solicitó el apoyo de KIVA MiCrédito  para la compra de gaseosas, leche,  granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, azúcar) productos que cuentan con más demanda entre los  consumidores que la visitan a diario.  Su próxima meta es mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Claudia's small grocery store has become quite popular in her neighborhood. Every day she serves her clients with kindness, a quality which characterizes her. Her son is part of this project, he was the reason she established the business, with the goal of spending more time together at home. Claudia has been able to earn a good income thanks to the sales and wants to keep up the rhythm. She wants to increase her inventory and suffer no shortage of anything. This is why she requested the support of KIVA MiCrédito to purchase sodas, milk and basic grains (rice, beans, sugar) products which are in high demand among the consumers that visit her daily. Her next goal is to improve her home.

loans.use: purchase sodas, milk, basic grains (rice, beans, sugar).

loans.name: Rubelio De Jesús

texts.es:
Rubelio es un habilidoso y simpático productor de flores, él, junto a su padre lideran una gran productora de flores y hortalizas que vende sus productos a comercializadoras internacionales.
Son dignos exponentes del empuje y fuerza nacional que comparten y colorean el mundo con sus flores.
El ha tenido momentos muy difíciles económicamente a causa de la perdida de muchos cultivos y es difícil mantenerse en el negocio.
Solicita un auxilio económico para comprar fertilizantes y plaguicidas, de esta manera realizara el mantenimiento a sus cultivos y garantizara su calidad.
Uno de sus más grandes sueños es poder tener un gran comercializadora y productora de flores que sea estable y duradera en el tiempo.
texts.en:
Rubelio is a skilled and pleasant horticulturist. He and his father lead a large flower and vegetable production business that sells its products to international exporters. They are worthy examples of the nation's spirit and strength, who share color with the world through their flowers.

He has experienced times of great financial difficulty after losing many cultivars, and it is difficult to maintain the business. He is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer and insecticide, so that he can maintain his plants and guarantee their quality. One of his greatest dreams is to be able to have a large production and export business that is stable and will last a long time.

loans.use: to purchase agriculture supplies such as fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es:
La señora Reyna Maribel de 43  años de edad es casada,  tiene 1  hijo  que depende de ella, radica en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, Valle al sur de Honduras,  tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 4 años  a la actividad de venta de abarrotería en su negocio ella vende jabón, frescos, pollo, carnes, arroz, frijoles, churros, etc., su venta es con los vecinos y amigos que a diario visitan su negocio.
Doña Reyna es una mujer emprendedora que trata día con día para sacara adelante a su familia.
Doña Reyna está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de abarrotería en general como ser maíz, azúcar, frijoles, arroz, manteca, aceite, carnes, jabon, detergente, cloro, pan, leche, queso, quesillo y otros productos para su negocio ya que desea surtir mas su negocio para esta época de semana santa, con el préstamo que ella solicita surtirá más el negocio y por ende tendrá mejores ganancias que las utilizara para invertirlas más en su negocio.
Doña Reyna su sueño es mejorar su negocio.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2014.
texts.en:
Reyna Maribel is 43 years old, married, and has one dependent son. She lives in the community of San Lorenzo, a valley in the southern part of Honduras. She lives in her own house has been selling groceries for the past four years. She sells soap, fruit drinks, chicken, meat, rice, beans, chips, etc. to neighbors and friends who visit her shop every day. 

Reyna is an enterprising woman who tries day after day to raise her family. She is asking for the loan to buy general groceries such as corn, sugar, beans, rice, lard, oil, meat, ham, detergent, bleach, bread milk, cheese, and other products for her business so that she can stock up for the coming holiday. By using the loan to stock up, her income will increase and she will reinvest the earnings in her business. 

Reyna's dream is to improve her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - March 2014

loans.use: to buy groceries such as corn, sugar, beans, rice, lard, oil, meats, soap, detergent, bleach, bread, milk, cheese, and other products for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials to construct a sink for storing water.

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en: Thomas is an organic certified Maya Mountain Cacao farmer who lives in the beautiful village of San Pedro Columbia, in the Toledo District of Southern Belize. He started planting cacao trees in 1975 and currently has approximately 478 trees. Thomas  sees cacao as a productive long term crop that will be beneficial for him and his family. He plans to secure a loan to do some cleaning on his farm, to continue expanding it and to build a nursery of his own.

loans.use: To clean his productive cacao trees

loans.name: Claro

texts.es:
Claro es un hombre de 35 años de edad,  es un agricultor que estudio hasta noveno  grado,  es casado la esposa se dedica a los oficios  doméstico, han procreado cuatro hijos tres de ellos están en la escuela.


Don Claro se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 15 años este trabajo se lo enseño el hermano mayor, él solo a esto se dedica y fue así hoy que él ya se casó y  esto le ha servid mucho ya que de eso es que lleva el sostén de la casa este trabajo le queda a una distancia de 10 minutos,  viaja a pie este trabajo lo hace en un horario de las 5.30 am a las 11am 

Con el préstamo solicitado lo ocupara para comprar los insumos agrícolas comprara 6 sacos de abono y herbicidas para matar la hierba mala que le afecta a los cultivos  y para pagar el alquiler del terreno en donde cultivara.  Esto mejorara mucho porque con la ayuda del préstamo cultivara más y así podrá tener más ingresos cuando salga 
 la cosecha.

Los sueños de don Claro es poder seguir cultivando y poder ayudarles a sus  hijos en el estudio, que ellos se superen académicamente que es una herencia que les dejara que les servirá mucho esto lo lograra con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo
texts.en:
Claros is a 35-year old man.  He is a farmer who went to school until 9th grade.  He is married, and his wife takes care of the household chores.  They have had four children, three of whom go to school.  

Don Claros has made his living in agriculture for the last 15 years.  He learned the trade from an older brother.  Don Claros makes his living solely from farming, and farming has allowed him to be a married man today.  The farming has served him well, as it has allowed him to support his household.  Don Claros works about 10 minutes from his home, and gets there on foot.  He works from 5:30am to 11:00am.

With the requested loan, Don Claros will purchase agricultural supplies.  He will buy six sacks of compost and herbicide, to kill the weeds that are affecting his crop, and pay the rent on the land he will be planting.  All of this will improve his situation a lot because with the help of the loan he will be able to plant more and then earn a greater income when the harvest comes in. 

Don Claros's dreams are to be able to keep planting and to help his children in their schooling.  He wants his children to excel academically, which is a legacy he will leave to them and will serve them greatly.  Don Claros will achieve his dreams with a lot of effort and hard work.

loans.use: to purchase 6 sacks of compost and herbicides, to kill the weeds that are affecting his crop, and to pay the rent on the land he will be planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase high yielding grafted cacao trees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding cacao trees

loans.name: Adalila

texts.es:
Doña Adalila tiene un grado de educación de primaria incompleta pues ella solo curso hasta tercer grado, es madre soltera y solo tuvo dos hijos ellos son el apoyo en las diferentes actividades tanto en el campo como en el hogar, el mayor es graduado como maestro de educación primaria pero no trabaja desempañando tal carrera sino que como administrador de la tierra de su madre la cual es de 2 manzanas de café y la hija quien es maestra de educación primaria también pero ella le ayuda en la parte económica. El oficio de la agricultura lo aprendió a muy temprana edad pero desde hace siete años que lo hace de forma propia. La fuente de ingresos que ella tiene a parte de lo que su hija le brinda mensualmente es el café producto que al final de cada temporada es vendido en el mercado local en las diferentes bodegas de la ciudad.
Sus metas mejorar su calidad de vida, fortalecer el patrimonio para su familia y sus nietos y poder diversificar el producto que cultiva para no solo depender del café. Doña Adalila solicita pueda ser apoyada por los inversionistas en la plataforma de Kiva para la compra de insumos agrícolas que ayudaran a mantener sus cultivos de café sanos en esta nueva temporada los cuales pueden ser afectado por plagas, enfermedades y heladas las cuales son consecuencia de los diferentes cambios climáticos.
texts.en:
Doña Adalila has an incomplete level of primary education as she has only finished until third grade. She is a single mother and only had two children. They are her support in her different activities, as much as in the field as in the home. The older is graduated as a primary school teacher, but he does not work in that career, rather as administrator of his mother's land, which is 2 manzanas of coffee. The daughter, who is also a primary school teacher, but she helps her economically. 

She learned the agriculture trade at a very early age, but it was as of seven years ago that she made it her own. Aside from what her daughter brings her monthly, the source of income that she has is the coffee product, that at the end of each season is sold in the local market in the different warehouses of the city.  

Her goals are to improve her quality of life, strengthen her assets for her family and her grandchildren, and to be able to diversify the product that she grows in order to not only depend on the coffee. Doña Adalila requests that she can be supported by the Kiva platform investors for the purchase of agriculture inputs that will help her to maintain healthy coffee plants in this new season, which can be affected by infestations, diseases and freezes, which are the consequences of the different climate changes.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: para pagar la renta del terreno donde cultiva, además comprara parte de los fertilizantes que utilizara en el cultivo de maíz.

loans.name: Nicolás

texts.es:
Nicolás es un hombre soltero de 41 años de edad, actualmente tiene cinco hijos todos están estudiando y viven en el Departamento de Sololá.
Desde hace varios años don Nicolás inicio la labor de la producción de mil de abeja, porque sus padres le fueron enseñando cuando era pequeño y ahora el decidió seguir con esta actividad por lo que ya lleva 5 años. Comenta que esta labor es bastante rentable y productiva, en cuanto a la generación de ingresos y ganancias. A demás de lo que realiza también se dedica a la albañilería, con el propósito de generar otra fuente de ingresos.
A través de lo que realiza puede cubrir los gastos de su familia, por lo que ahora está solicitando un préstamo de Q 5,000.00 para la compra de materiales, que servirá para la producción de miel de abeja.
El sueño de don Nicolás es producir más miel de abeja, para incrementar sus ganancias y así asegurar la educación de sus hijos, para que en un futuro ellos tengan mejores oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
Nicolás is a 41 year old single man. He has 5 children. They are going to school and live in the department of Sololá. Several years ago, Nicolás started working in honey production. His parents taught him when he was young and he decided to continue with this activity and has been doing it for 5 years. He says that this work is very profitable and productive for income generation. he also works as a bricklayer in order to generate another source of income. Through what he does he can cover his family's expenses. Now he is asking for a loan of  Q 5,000.00 to buy materials that he will use for honey production. 

Nicolás' dream is to produce more honey to increase his earnings and ensure his children's education so that in the future they can have better better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy materials for honey production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase grafted, high-yielding, disease resistant cacao seedlings

loans.name: Carla

texts.es: Es originaria de Waspam, tiene 31 años de edad, casada, con 4 hijos, de los cuales 3 se encuentra en edad escolar y un pequeño de 2 años. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos, desde hace 2 años estableció su pequeña pulpería en el mercado municipal. También vende cosméticos por catálogo. Solicita su primer financiamiento para incrementar su inventario y comprar mercadería en Puerto Cabezas y ofrecer sus productos a precios accesibles en Waspam: Granos básicos, jabón de baño, de lavar ropa, de lavar traste, detergente, cloro, ropa interior para niños y niñas, pasta dental, salsa de tomate, leche, cepillo de diente, paste para lavar traste, chiverías, carbón y bastimestos (Banano, Yuca, quequisque, malanga, plátano, etc.). Su sueño es vender productos lácteos, mortadela, pollo, carne molida y que sea un negocio prospero.
texts.en: She is from Waspam. She is 31 years old, married and has 4 children. Three of them are school aged and she has a 2 year old. In order to have her own source of  income, 25 years ago, she opened a small store in the main market. She also sells cosmetics via catalog. She is asking for her first loan to increase her inventory and buy merchandise in Puerto Cabezas to offer her products at accessible prices in Waspam:  basic grains, bathroom soap, detergent, dish soap, bleach, children's underwear, toothpaste, ketchup, milk, tooth brushes, snacks, coal and produce (bananas, yucca, quequisque, taro, plantains, etc.). Her dream is to sell dairy products, bologna, and ground meat, and for her business to be prosperous.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, bathroom soap, detergent, dish soap, bleach, children's underwear, toothpaste, ketchup, milk, tooth brushes, snacks, coal and produce (bananas, yucca, quequisque, taro, plantains, etc.).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase grafted cacao seedlings

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: Es un señor amable y alegre, originario de Waspam, tiene 40 años de edad, casado con 3 hijos menores de edad. Cuenta con una experiencia de 7 años en la docencia. Desde hace aproximadamente 5 años vive en una casa de madera y tambo con un solo espacio, viviendo en hacinamiento con su familia. Con el propósito de mejorar su vivienda y que su familia viva de manera segura y digna solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar materiales para mejorar su vivienda: madera cepillada y rustica, postes de madera, zinc, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es tener una casa segura y con las condiciones básicas para la comodidad de sus hijos. Quiere acondicionar también su casa con un inodoro, construir una  fosa séptica, ya que actualmente tiene una letrina en regular estado y construir los dormitorios para su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar is a friendly and happy man who comes from Waspam. He is 40 years old, and is married with 3 young children. He has seven years of experience as a teacher. Since approximately 5 years ago, he has lived in a stilt house made out of wood with only one room, living in an overcrowded space with his family. 

With the intent of improving his home and allowing his family to live more safely and respectably, he is requesting his first loan to purchase materials to improve his home: planed and rustic timber, wood posts, zinc, nails, and to cover the cost of labor. His dream is to have a safe home with basic conditions for his children's comfort. He also wants to set his house up with a bathroom and to build a septic tank because currently he has a latrine in a normal state, and he would like to build bedrooms for his family.

loans.use: to purchase materials to improve his home: planed and rustic timber, wood posts, zinc, nails, and to cover to the cost of labor.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a Ghanaian artisan who specializes in hand-carved masks and sculptures. He would like to invest in the bulk purchase of wood, beads, paints and sandpaper, and also to hire assistants.

Ibrahim has been selling through NOVICA since 2009. This is his story:

"When I was a child, I had to leave school at a very young age due to our family's financial situation. Eventually I learned the wood carvers' trade from my uncle. The greatest challenge I have faced is not having enough funds to purchase the materials I need to work. My greatest motivation comes from people's admiration of my work – their comments inspire me to continue. I am now happily married, I enjoy my craft, and I share my expertise with the students I teach. I love this art form!"

"Thank you for making this microcredit possible. It will make stocking up on materials possible."
