Use the link below to view Ibrahim's hand-carved wood masks and sculptures on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/7056

loans.use: to purchase wood, beads, paints and sandpaper, and to hire assistants

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Doña Jesus de 68 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus hijas, ella se dedica a la venta de tortas y licuados, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, Doña Jesus está solicitando un crédito para la compra de panes, mortadelas, mayonesa, aderezos, frutas, leche, carnes, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poder tener junto con sus hija una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Doña Jesus is 68 years old and lives with her daughters. She sells sandwiches and milkshakes, a business she runs from her home. She has many customers because of her friendliness as she makes a sale. 

Doña Jesus is requesting a loan to purchase bread, mortadellas [type of cold cut], mayonnaise, spices, fruit, milk, meat, etc. so that she can continue working in this business. This is her only source of income, and with this loan she and her daughters will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase bread, mortadellas, mayonnaise, spices, fruit, milk, meat, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags of corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron, bricks, and gravel to build a bathroom and repair the floor in the hallway and entrance to his home

loans.name: Kevin Daniel

texts.es:
El joven Kevin  de 19 años de edad, se dedica a la prestación de servicios de trasporte con el vehículo de su padre, él trabaja de lunes a jueves, también trabaja en una foto estudio que está ubicada en su municipio, el joven se creció con sus padres quienes lo educaron y lo apoyaron en sus estudios hasta que se graduó como bachiller técnico en el área de periodismo. luego él comenzó a trabajar en una comercial como promotor de ventas, con el paso del tiempo aprendió el trabajo de la fotografía de un amigo y recomendó para ocupar su lugar y que el tubo que realizar un viaje fuera del país, de esta forma comenzó a desempañarse como fotógrafo en ese local y es esa actividad la que realiza en la actualidad,  también aprendió a conducir motocicleta, ya tiene esa ventaja de poder moverse con más rapidez a cubrir eventos donde le solicitan de sus servicios. 


El préstamo será utilizado en consolidar deudas con un amigo quien le presto dinero para adquirir una cámara profesional para tomar fotos y filmar videos de esta manera comienza a montar sus propio negocio de toma de fotografías y videos de esta manera quedara libre de deudas y mejoran sus ingresos ya que se dedicara a cubrir su propio negocio,  y le será mucho más fácil la realización de una cuota para cancelar el crédito.


Las metas que él tiene para un futuro son las de pagar su crédito y hacer una nueva solicitud de crédito para montar una  foto estudio en su comunidad y una papelería y continuar con sus estudios ya que su sueño es de ser ingeniero civil en construcción y apoyar en la formación educativa de sus hermanos.
texts.en:
Kevin is a young man of 19 years old. From Monday to Thursday, he works providing transportation services using his father's vehicle. He also works in a photo studio in his town. He grew up with his parents, who brought him up and supported him in his studies, until he graduated high school with a technical qualification in journalism. He then started working for a company as a sales representative. Over time he learned photography from a friend, who recommended Kevin for his position when he had to travel abroad. In this post, Kevin began to be successful as a photographer, and this is the work that is now most important to him. He also learned to ride a motorcycle, which gives him the advantage of being able to move around more quickly, and cover events where his services are sought for.

He will use the loan to consolidate his debts with a friend, who lent him money to buy a professional camera to take photos and videos. Using this, he is starting to set up his own business, offering photographic and video services. With his own business he will be able to free himself from debts and improve his income, and it will be much easier for him to make his loan repayments. 

Kevin's goals for the future are to repay his loan, and then to seek a further loan to set up a photo studio in his local community, as well as a stationer's shop. He hopes to continue his studies, and his dream is to be a civil engineer specialising in construction, and support his siblings in their education.

loans.use: to consolidate his debts with a friend who lent him money to buy a professional camera to take photos and videos.

loans.name: Lusila

texts.en:
Lusila is 27 years old and married with five children. 

She has a small garden where she grows cucumbers, tomatoes, eggplant and cabbages that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years. Lusila needs a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, chemicals, knives, a spade, a garden hose, fertilizer and vegetable seeds. 

She has been a member of SBPD since 2013. Lusila will use the profits from her sales to support her family and her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, chemicals, knives, a spade, a garden hose, fertilizer and vegetable seeds

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy jugs of vegetable oil and [bags of] corn.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and a serger

loans.name: Muipu

texts.en:
Muipu is 57 years old and married with six children. She has a small garden where she grows tomatoes and cabbages that she sells in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years. Muipu needs a loan to buy fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, gloves, weed killer chemicals and seeds. 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2014. Muipu will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, gloves, weed killer chemicals and seeds

loans.name: Erney David

texts.es:
Erney es un joven emprendedor de 19 años, vive con su esposa y tiene un hijo de 1 año por el cual trabaja infatigablemente todos los días en su negocio de comercialización de gas en pipetas.
Trabaja con el afán de buscar ingresos que le permitan garantizarle una buena calidad de vida a su familia.
Este joven quiere aumentar sus ventar y consolidar su negocio, por eso requiere de un aliento económico para comprar un inventario de pipetas de gas más amplio y tener siempre el producto disponible para sus clientes, esto le dará la oportunidad de obtener utilidades de su negocio y darle mayor empuje a su actividad.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener una comercializadora de víveres bien posicionada.
texts.en:
Erney is an enterprising young man, age 19. He lives with his wife, and he has a one-year-old child for whom he works tirelessly every day in his business selling gas cylinders. He works with the aim of finding the income that will allow him to guarantee a good quality of life for his family. 

This young man wants to increase his sales and strengthen his business, so he is requesting economic support in order to purchase a larger inventory of gas cylinders and always have the product available to his customers. This will give him the opportunity to realize profits from his business and strengthen his enterprise. 

His biggest dream is to be able to have a well-positioned food supply company.

loans.use: to purchase a larger inventory of domestic gas cylinders.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost,  seeds, herbicides, etc. and improve his land

loans.name: Fifonsi Gbenondou Group

texts.fr: FIFONSI GBENONDOU est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Rose (qui a la main levée sur la photo), est mariée à un certain Joseph. Le couple a trois enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés, et tous à leur charge. Rose vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges du ménage. Il y a plus de quinze ans que Rose mène comme activité la vente de charbon de bois et du maïs à son domicile ; ce qui lui permet de mieux faire face à ses besoins quotidiens. Rose s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Rose  sollicite un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FIFONSI GBENONDOU. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The Fifonsi Gbenondou group is composed of three individuals living in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, Rose (the one raising her hand in the photo) is married to a man named Joseph. They have three children, some of whom are in school, and all of whom are in the couple's care. Rose lives together with her husband and children. The spouses jointly provide for various household needs. For over 15 years, Rose has been selling firewood and corn out of her home, which allows to better manage everyday expenses. Rose stocks up in a town of Benin. With the goal of strengthening her business and better respond to customer demand, Rose is seeking a fourth loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of her group. Their prior loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy charcoal and corn.

loans.name: Willian Antonio

texts.es:
Willian es una persona muy conocida y respetada en la comunidad por alta voluntad de servicio a los demás,  es una persona con buenos principios morales y espirituales de 36 años de edad, él se creció con sus padres y sus abuelos quienes se encargaron de inculcarle los buenos valores que son los que hoy en día lo han llevado a salir adelante y a ser una persona de bien y de éxito.

 El señor Willian curso sus estudios de educación básica en la escuela de la comunidad, estudiaba todos los días por la tarde ya que por las mañanas se dedicaba a ayudar en los quehaceres agrícolas de su padre y su abuelo ya que en esa época era su principal fuente de ingresos económicos y lo que le ayudaba a dar el sustento diario de su familia y de esa forma podían satisfacer las necesidades básicas de su hogar, con el paso del tiempo el señor Willian adquirió conocimiento y experiencia en el manejo de los cultivos de granos básicos y fue de esa manera que se fue independizando y fue cuando consocio a su esposa con quien decidió formar su hogar y concretar su vida  con quien son padres de 3 hijos de los que se encuentran estudiando en la escuela  de su comunidad.

Él se dedica a la prestación de servicios de motorista en la alcaldía de su municipio, esta actividad la aprendió de su mejor amigo quien trabajaba en una unidad de transporte público y los fines de semana  Willian lo acompañaba al viaje de la mañana y fue de esa manera que fue aprendiendo a conducir vehículos hasta que se convirtió en un profesional para realizar este trabajo y llevando a cabo esta actividad tiene 15 años que con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio ha logrado adquirir su propio vehículo y comenzó a prestar servicio de transporte.


El dinero será utilizado en mejoramiento de su vivienda ya que por encontrarnos en época de lluvia su casa necesita una pronta reparación del techo. De esta manera, dará una mejor protección a sus hijos y a toda su familia. Ya que es un derecho fundamental para la vida.

Las proyecciones que él tiene para su futuro son las de tener su casa terminada y con todas las condiciones para el descanso y protección de su familia, y ayudar en todo lo necesario para que sus hijos puedan ser unos profesionales de éxito,  ya que manifiesta que uno de ellos quiere ser ingeniero en construcciones, y todo esto lo lograra con la buena inversión de sus ganancias y la inversión de un crédito nuevo.
texts.en:
Willian is a respected person and well-known in his community for his high sense of service to others. He is a person of good moral and religious beliefs. He is 36 years old. He grew up with his parents and grand-parents who took it upon themselves to teach him the values that today have gotten him ahead, to be a good person and successful.

Willian went to the local school where he studied all morning and in the afternoons he helped his father and grandfather with the agricultural chores. At this time agriculture was their main source of income, what helped to provide sustenance to the family and paid for the basic needs of the family. With the passing of time Willian gained knowledge and experience in managing the growing of basic grains and became independent. He met his wife at this time and they decide to form a family. They have 3 children who study in the local school.

He works as a driver for the municipal government. He learned this activity from his best friend who worked in a public transportation unit. On week-ends Willian would accompany him in the mornings as he learned how to drive vehicles. He became a professional in order to do this work and he has been doing this for 15 years. With much effort and sacrifice he managed to obtain his own vehicle and offer transportation services.

The money from the loan will be used to make improvements on his house. It is the rainy season and the roof needs some immediate repairs. In this way he will provide his children and his whole family with more security. That is a fundamental right in life. The plans he has for the future include finishing his house with all the necessary conditions for the rest and protection of his family. He wants to help his children all he can so they become successful professionals. One of them has indicated a desire to be a civil engineer and Willian can mange this with good investments of his income and the help of a new loan.

loans.use: to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Filoi

texts.en:
Filoi is a 44 years old married woman with seven children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years.Filoi has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, fertilizer, a rake, a shovel, a file, a spade, and a wheelbarrow. 

She has been a member of SBPD since 2013. With her profit Filoi hopes to assist her family financially and support her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, fertilizer, a rake, a shovel, a file, a spade, and a wheelbarrow

loans.name: Genis Maria

texts.es:
Genis es una orgullosa madre soltera de un joven de 17 años y desde que se separo del hombre que era su esposo ha tenido que llevar toda la obligación en el hogar y cumplir con todas las responsabilidades en el sustento de su familia.
Ella tiene múltiples actividades económicas como la producción de plátano, cría de pollos de engorde y adicional posee un pequeño almacén de venta de mercancía en Tierra Alta, Córdoba.
Ella requiere de un favor económico para comprar insumos que le permitan trabajar y realizar mantenimiento a sus tierras como abonos, riegos, plaguicidas, entre otros. Esto le permitirá mantener sus cultivos limpios y libres de cualquier tipo de plaga que los afecte, de esta manera podrá seguir produciendo sus cultivos y venderá productos de excelente calidad a sus clientes que en su mayoría son habitantes de la misma región.
texts.en:
Genis is the proud single mother of a 17-year-old teenager. Since she separated from the man that was her husband, she has had to assume all household obligations and fulfill all responsibilities to support her family. She has various occupations like the production of plantain, raising and fattening of chicken, and additionally she owns a small store that sells merchandise in Tierra Alta, Córdoba.      

She needs a loan to pay for supplies that will allow her to work and maintain her land like fertilizers, irrigation, and pesticides, among other things. This will permit her to maintain her crops clean and free of any type of plagues that affect them. In this manner, she will be able to continue producing her crop and selling products of excellent quality to her customers, who are mainly residents of the same region.

loans.use: to pay for supplies for the maintenance of her land like fertilizers and irrigation.

loans.name: Markyuri Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Joven Markyuri Del Carmen  habita en el municipio de El. Jicaral departamento de león, una ciudad hermosa donde existen diversas actividades comerciales.

Es una joven de 27 años de edad soltera, no tiene hijos bajo su cargo, pero está esperando un bebe son de sus sueños llegarle a dar una mejor vida.
 
Desde hace tres años se dedica a trabajar como empleada, ejerciendo el cargo de cajera en una de las instituciones del municipio, 

En una de las promociones realizada se dio cuenta que ceprodel y kiva existía y tomo la decisión de llegar ha ceprodel por primera vez con el objetivo de solicitar un crédito para la compra de: una cama cuna y un TV 14´´ ya que son de sus sueños brindarle una mejor vida a su hijita que tanto espera y tener mejores condiciones, pero para esto solo lo puede lograr que Kiva Y Ceprodel le Conceda la mano amigable a través de un pequeño financiamiento.  

Se siente a gusto a verse encontrado con ceprodel y Kiva porque tiene La Fe en Dios que esto le Ayudaran Micho en el desarrollo de su vida.
texts.en:
Markyuri Del Carmen lives in the city of El Jicaral in the Department of Leon.  This is a beautiful city with a lot of different types of commerce.

Markyuri Del Carmen is 27 years old and is single.  She has no dependent children, but she is expecting a baby, and she dreams of giving this child a better life.  She's been employed for 3 years as a cashier in one of the institutions in the city.

After seeing an advertisement, she realized that CEPRODEL and Kiva existed, and she decided to come to CEPRODEL for the first time with the intent of applying for a loan to buy a crib and a 14" TV.  This is because she wants so much to provide her long-awaited baby girl with a better life.  However, she can only accomplish this if Kiva and CEPRODEL lend her a friendly hand through a small loan. 

Markyuni Del Carmen feels comfortable working with CEPRODEL and Kiva, because she has faith in God that this will help her a lot in her life.

loans.use: to buy a crib and a 14" TV

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: A loan of $1,500 helped Nadia to buy a sewing machine, an over sewing machine,  and an iron.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
This is Lilian, 45, a resident of Tanza, Cavite City, Philippines. She is married and she has children who are helping her manage their household. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Lilian operates a market stall. She sells fruits and vegetable products in the community market. She buys quantity of fruits and vegetables and sells them per kilo. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 8,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities of fruits and vegetables to expand her product inventory.

Lilian hopes that her business will continue and dreams of giving her children a good education. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more quantities of fruits and vegetables to expand her product inventory.

loans.name: Phut's Group

texts.en:
Phut, 58, is a resident from Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She deals with her daily cost of living via rice cropping on two hectares area and a paid-working job. She has been involved in the current business for 11 years with a decent income in return. This positive impact resulted from the outcome from the past loans which she has fully repaid. 

With VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), she is in her fourth–cycled loan and she is a leader of a group consisting of three for this cycle. She and one of her co-borrowers are seeking 1,400,000 KHR whereas her joint borrower is applying for 1,000,000 KHR. 

As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and insecticide, and to pay for labor cost. She strongly believes that she can gain a good yield, better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seed, and insecticide, and to pay for labor cost

loans.name: Manila

texts.en:
Manila is a 34-year-old woman with 7 children. She has a small plantation and grows taros, bananas, and peanuts to earn a living. She has been doing this for 4 years.

Manila has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed spray, a wheelbarrow, a spade, and an axe. 

She has been a member of SBPD since 2013. With her profits, Manila hopes to support her family and her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed spray, a wheelbarrow, a spade, and an axe for farming.

loans.name: Saran's Group

texts.en: A mother of seven children and in her early 50s, Saran is a resident from Moung Russey district of Battambang province, where she grows her one hectare of rice cropping and one hectare of sesame farming. This is the business that she has had for 11 years. This is the fourth micro loan for Saran and her joint borrower in a group of two. She has repaid her past loan with success, and it has enabled her to improve her lifestyle from before. Now, she and her co-borrower are seeking 1,400,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide and to pay for labor costs. She strongly believes that she can gain a good yield, better than last year.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabrics, scarves and soaps.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to assist her crops.

loans.name: Constancio

texts.en:
Constancio has maintained their little abode at Talairon, Oroquieta City. He has a business buying and selling various items. He is a responsible husband and father at the same time a hardworking businessman. In need of financial assistance, he applied for a loan from PMPC to purchase housing materials. He has his house for renovation.  

Constancio smiles at the thought of living comfortably with his family intact at their newly renovated house. He promised himself to keep up his obligations with the Cooperative.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials for renovation

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an air-conditioner and chair and renovate his barber shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and table for her sewing business.

loans.name: Josie

texts.en: As a way of generating income, Josie engages in making and selling refreshment foods within her community. She is 35 years old and has four children attending school. She aims to make her business profitable in order to generate a higher income to support her children's education. Having insufficient capital, she is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy necessary ingredients like milk, sugar, coconut, and other ingredients needed in preparing ice candies and other refreshment foods for sale. As a kind and hard-working mother, she believes that she will make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like milk, sugar, coconut, and other ingredients needed for preparing refreshment foods.

location.town: Brgy. Inaban, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Claudia Lissette

texts.es:
Claudia, tiene una familia con la que comparte la armonía de su hogar, vive junto a su esposo, dos hijos de 12 y 15 años de edad, anteriormente vendía papas fritas y hog dog, se lo enseño su madre, pero actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, en un horario de ocho de la mañana  a cinco de la tarde, ya tiene un año con dicho negocio.
Efectuara la compra de faldas, pantalones, camisas, vestidos, chores, y otras piezas que le sirvan de atractivo para sus clientes y así aumentar sus ventas, con los nuevos ingresos podrá cancelar con puntualidad su deuda y ofrecer a su familia nuevas oportunidades de desarrollo.
Su objetivo es mantener su negocio activo y retomar la venta de meriendas, de esta manera será autosostenible.
texts.en:
Claudia, who has a family with whom she shares a harmonious house, lives with her husband and her twelve-year-old and fifteen-year-old children. She used to sell french fries and hot dogs as her mother taught her, but she is currently sells used clothing from 8:00 in the morning until 5:00 in the afternoon. She has had this business for a year. 

She will purchase skirts, pants, shirts, dresses, shorts, and other attire that attract clients and increase her sales. With the new income, she will be able to repay her debts on time and offer her family new opportunities to grow. 

Her goal is to maintain an active business and resume selling snacks to make her self-sustaining.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, shirts, dresses, shorts, and other attire

loans.name: Amataga

texts.en:
Amataga is a 37-year-old woman with 3 children. 
 
She grows cucumbers, tomatoes, green peppers, eggplant, and vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. 

Amataga has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a spade, a garden hose, a wheel barrow, vegetable seeds, weed spray, a pair of gloves, and a rake. With her profits, Amataga hopes to improve her business to help her family and support her children's education.
               
She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a spade, a garden hose, a wheel barrow, vegetable seeds, weed spray, a pair of gloves, and a rake.

loans.name: Rosa Candida

texts.es:
Rosa es una persona de 43 años de edad, ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al comercio ya que es propietaria de una mini tienda en la comunidad y también se dedica al cuidado de su familia. Ella se creció con sus padres quienes se dedicaban al comercio, día sábado en la plaza del pueblo y los demás días de la semana a trabajos agrícolas, y de albañilería.  Ella realizo sus estudios de educación básica hasta 4 grado en la escuela nacional y no pudo continuar sus estudios porque su familia es de escasos recursos y ella es una de las hermanas mayores por lo cual dejo de estudiar y se dedicó al negocio de la familia, con el paso del tiempo decidió poner su propio negocio el cual comenzó con la venta de productos  de primera necesidad y en la actualidad comercializa con productos de medicina natural.  Ella es casada y madre de Y formar su propio 3 hijos las cuales se encuentran estudiando en la escuela de su comunidad.

El préstamo otorgado, será utilizado para invertirlo en la ampliación y mejoramiento de su casa, ya que ha comenzado construir los servicios sanitarios y una pila con lavadero y necesita terminarlos para que su casa cuente con los servicios de saneamiento básico, y otra parte será invertida en agricultura en la siembra de granos básicos  y surtir su negocio de esta manera mantendrá surtido de productos su negocio y dará un mejor servicio a sus clientes, por lo cual mejoraran sus ganancias económicas.

Las proyecciones que ella tiene para un futuro son las de fortalecer su negocio y tener un local más amplio que le permita montar una venta de pupusas los días de semana por la tarde, y apoyar el estudio de sus hijos hasta que sean unos profesionales de éxito, con el beneficio que le brinda el préstamo utilizara las ganancias para invertir y mejorar su casa ampliar y surtir su negocio y hará una nueva solicitud de crédito para montar un molino nixtamal en su casa.
texts.en:
Rosa is 43 years old. She does domestic work and works in commerce, since she is the proprietor of a mini store in the community, and she also takes care of her family. She grew up with her parents, who worked in commerce on Saturdays in the town plaza and worked in agriculture the other days of the week, as well as in masonry. She has a basic education through 4th grade in the national school, and she wasn't able to continue her studies because her family is of scarce resources and she is one of the older sisters, and so she left school and worked in the family business. With the passing of time, she decided to set up her own business, which began with the sale of basic products, and she now sells natural medicinal products. She is married and is the mother of three children, who go to the school in their community.

The loan granted will be used to invest in the expansion and improvement of her house, since she has begun to construct sanitary services and a wash area with a water trough, and she needs to finish them so that her house has basic sanitation services. Another part of the loan will be invested in agriculture, in planting basic grains, and in stocking her business; in this way she will keep her business stocked with products and will give better service to her customers, for which her economic earnings will improve.

The plans that she has for the future are to strengthen her business and have a larger shop, which will allow her to set up sales of pupusas (a typical Salvadoran dish) on weekdays in the afternoons and to support the schooling of her children until they are successful professionals. With the benefit that the loan offers her, she will use the proceeds to invest in and improve her house and expand and stock her business, and she will make a new loan application to set up a nixtamal (corn flour) mill in her house.

loans.use: to expand and improve her house, since she has begun to construct sanitary services and a wash area with a water trough; she will also invest in planting basic grains and stocking her business.

loans.name: Las Ñustas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS ÑUSTAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dunia ella es casada y tiene 50 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia vende chompas, telares y mantas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para comprar chompas, telares y mantas.
 
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de zapatos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de artesanía.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "Las Ñustas." This bank is located in the Cusco district, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

This member is Señora Dunia. She is married and is 50 years old. She has three children. She works in her business of selling handicrafts. She sells sweaters, weavings, and blankets. She works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. She has already been in this business for 5 years, and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to enlarge her business of selling handicrafts. She is applying for the loan to buy products such as sweaters, weavings, and blankets.

The other members work in businesses of selling clothing, selling shoes, grocery store, and selling handicrafts.

This bank member is grateful to those who form part of this dream through this means, and she promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy products such as sweaters, weavings, and blankets

loans.name: Marjurie

texts.en: Marjurie is 36 years old, married and has four children. Her spouse is a farmer and a construction worker too. Marjurie raises hogs for future sale. She generates about PHP 2,000 each time a hog is sold. She is now asking for additional capital of PHP 8,000 to use in her hog-raising business. She will buy feed and medicines for her hogs' sustenance. She hopes to give better sustenance to her hogs and someday gain a higher price each time a hog is sold..

loans.use: to buy feed and medicines for her hogs

loans.name: Mario

texts.en: Mario, 40 years old, is married to Lorelyn. Mario is engaged in farming to sustain the needs of his children. He is a person with determination in all aspect of his life. He always makes sure that he can give allowances to his children who are going to school. Mario is borrowing money to buy fertilizer, pesticide and seeds for his farm business so that he can harvest more crops this coming harvesting season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide and seeds for his farm business

loans.name: Janeth Amparo

texts.es:
Janeth, se ha decidido por un nuevo crédito para reactivar su negocio, comprara maíz por mayoreo, cal, leña y gas propano, teniendo la materia prima a su disposición se mantendrá trabajando y teniendo ingresos para la subsistencia de su familia.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a tener una producción mayor para satisfacer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Janeth has decided on a new loan to reinvigorate her business. She will buy corn wholesale, lime, firewood, and propane gas. Having the basic materials on hand, she will continue working and having income for her family's subsistence.

The previous loan helped her to have a greater production to satisfy her customers.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale, lime, firewood, and propane gas

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 65 years old, married, and has one adult child. She has a small business buying and selling a variety of items. She earns a promising income of 10,000 PHP doing this type of work. In need of financial assistance, she approached PMPC for her house repair in Labo, Ozamiz City. 

Rosita maintains a good repayment record and will be able to repay her loan in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy materials for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for his son's tuition fees and other school expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his daughter's tuition fees and other school expenses.

loans.name: Sui

texts.en: Sui is 54 years old and has been with her partner for 20 years. They now have four children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for three years. Sui has requested a loan to buy a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, a large frying pan, cooking oil, and a new oven. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Sui will pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, a frying pan, cooking oil, and a new oven

loans.name: Geofrey

texts.en:
Geofrey is a hard working man dealing in a transport business in Hoima, Uganda. He works seven days a week. He is married with three children and one attends school. He started his business to get money to educate his children. He hopes to grow his business. Geofrey complains of competition.

He is acquiring a loan to complete the payments for his vehicle.

loans.use: to complete the payments for his vehicle.

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en: Rehema is married with six children, three of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. She has been selling green bananas in the market at wholesale for 10 years, working two days a week. She has applied for a loan of 500,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bunches of  green bananas to sell. She does not generate any additional income. Her major business challenges include transportation and seasonality. She is aspiring to acquire a delivery van to ease transportation. She joined MCDT because of the school fees loan product. She resides with her husband in their own house with access to both electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of green bananas.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy perfumes, incense and ingredients to make ice cream

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a 37-year-old woman with four children. She makes and sells ice cake in her community to earn a living. She has two years of experience with this business. Jane needs a loan to buy cordials, a cooler, Chinese lollies, foam cups, sugar and plastic bags. She plans to use her profits to improve her business. Jane joined SPBD in 2014

loans.use: to buy cordials, a cooler, Chinese lollies, foam cups, sugar and plastic bags

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a large frying pan, cooking oil, a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, plastic plates and a roll of tissues.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a farmer who plants palay and corn in Molave. She is 42 years old and is very responsible, providing the best for her family. 

Gemma wants to increase sales and she has requested a loan that will enable her to pay for the labor for land preparation a seedbed. Gemma hopes to continue to put bread on the table and to continue to pay off her obligations with the cooperative in a timely manner.

loans.use: to pay for the labor for land preparation and a seedbed.

loans.name: Azzaya

texts.en: Mr. Azzaya, 35 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. He has been working as an engineer at a power plant since 2008. His wife is a nurse and works at a children's hospital. Their children go to high school. Azzaya is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to buy building materials such as planks, cement and bricks for his house extension. The extension will serve as a barrier against heat loss, thus reducing coal usage and releasing less pollutants into the air.

loans.use: to make an extension to his house.

loans.name: Fayzikhon

texts.en: Fayzikhon is a young and energetic man. He is 19 years old and married. His wife is housewife. Fayzikhon is a student in his first course. He studies Energetics at the Polytechnic University of Tajikistan. He studies well. Fayzikhon likes math, physics and sports. He is a very ambitions and kind young man. He must pay for his tuition but he has no money. He is asking for a loan of 1,025 USD to pay for tuition. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 43 years old  and very responsible with her household obligations, since she has always been known to provide the best for her family. She currently lives with her husband and four children. She is a farmer who plants corn and palay.

Josephine wants to increase her sales. Consequently, she has requested a loan that will enable her to purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer, among other items, so that she can continue to put bread on the table in her home.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost, fertilizer and other items

location.town: Molave - San Jose Mahayag Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Emma is a farmer from Molave. She is 44 years old and is very responsible with her household obligations. She wants to increase her sales. Recently, she applied for a loan that will enable her to purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer, among other items, so that she can continue to support the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer.

loans.name: Aydin

texts.en:
Aydin is a 30-year-old refugee who lives with his family in an IDP settlement. He is married and has a son. His wife is a housekeeper and educates their child. The source of family’s income is gardening. Aydin has been working in this field for five years and has good experience. His monthly income is 250 AZN.

Aydin raises seasonal vegetables such as cucumbers, pumpkins, onions, greens, tomatoes and potatoes and then sells them at the local bazaar. People visit his grocery business because they know that the products there are always fresh and tasty and they are cheaper than in other grocery businesses.  

Aydin applied for a 1,200 AZN loan in order to buy fruit trees seeds. He wants to expand his assortment of groceries and increase his monthly income. This will help him to provide his family with a good life. This is his second loan and he has a positive client history.

loans.use: to buy fruit tree seeds and an assortment of groceries

loans.name: Ivy Joy

texts.en:
Ivy Joy is 29 years old and owns a corn field. She supports her husband in doing this business in Molave. They grow various crops but have focused more on corn.

Ivy Joy wants to increase their sales and so she has applied for a loan recently to purchase farm inputs and fertilizers.
 
She deeply wishes to see all her children finish their studies, and to be able to repay her loan on time.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Nestor

texts.en:
This is Nestor, 60, a resident of Malibay, Pasay, Philippines. He is a widower and he has children who are all working. He continues to work to provide for his needs and to save for the future.

Nestor oversees operations of their jeepney transportation business. They have one jeepney that carries up to sixteen passengers to their destination within the community. He earns from the *boundary (daily quota) their driver remits everyday. He also has a pedicab for additional income. Their regular passengers and customers are from the local community. He earns a minimum of 1000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in boundary every day.

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting a PHP 45,000 loan. He will be utilizing the loan for the maintenance of his jeepney unit.

Nestor hopes to have more vehicles and dreams of having a better future. He meets up with his co-fellowship** members to share stories of his life and business every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

*In the boundary system, the driver pays the jeepney owner a fixed amount (the “boundary”) for driving a passenger vehicle for 12 hours. It is as if the driver is renting the vehicle. What he earns from passenger fares above the “boundary,” minus what he paid for the gas and oil, is his take-home pay.

**All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and the maintenance of their jeepney unit.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a farmer living in the Kisii area of South Nyanza Kenya, which is a primary banana- and sugarcane-growing area. He is married and has five children, all of school going age. Samuel has been farming for the past 18 years and his primary income source comes from milk, eggs, tea, maize, bananas, and sugarcane. He also has a retail business and he enjoys farming since it is his main source of income, but his biggest challenges are poor roads and the lack of market.

Samuel chose this loan because it will help him purchase a dairy cow. The cow will help increase the amount of milk for both consumption and selling and thus add to Samuel's income. This will improve his family’s living standards.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's education.

loans.name: Taesali

texts.en:
Taesali is a 49-year-old married woman with 4 children.
 
She has a small plantation and grows vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years.Taesali has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, bushknives, a crowbar, a chainsaw and a pickaxe.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits,Taesali hopes to improve her business to help her family.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, bushknives, a crowbar, a chainsaw and a pickaxe

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.en:
From Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Leonardo busies himself with his farming activities, planting palay and corn. He is 57 years old and is very responsible with his household obligations. He currently lives with his wife and two children. In need of financial capitalization, he applied for a loan to PMPC to pay for labor for land preparation and seedbeds.

Leonardo sees an opportunity to increase his income for this cropping season.

loans.use: to pay for labor for land preparation and seedbeds.

loans.name: Sisigafua

texts.en: Sisigafua is a 36 year old woman with 1 child. She has a small business selling vegetables at her flea market to earn a living. She has been doing this for 4 years. Sisigafua has requested a loan to buy weed sprayers, chemicals, gloves, a wheelbarrow and seeds. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. She hopes to renew her house with her profits.

loans.use: to buy weed sprayers, chemicals, gloves, a wheelbarrow and seeds

loans.name: Fuifui

texts.en: Fuifui is 32 years old with a partner and six children. She would like to start a small business of elei printing. In order to do this, Fuifui needs a loan to buy color paints, brushes, fabrics, an elei carved board, and stencils. She hopes to use her profits to improve her business. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy color paints, brushes, fabric, an elei carved board, and stencils

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase and run two Fresh Life Toilets

loans.name: Abed Al- Nokta Group

texts.en:
This group is called Abed Al- Nokta. It consists of four women. They all live in traditional and simples families in Sana'a, Yemen. They know one another through friendship and neighborhood connections. They applied for a loan of 160, 000 YER from AMB. 
Norya is a 32-years- old married woman. She is the leader of the group. Norya lives with her family in their own house. She is an uneducated woman, but she is very dynamic and vigorous. She works as a house wife and her husband is the sole breadwinner of the family. Her husband built his own house, but he couldn't complete it. Most of rooms are not complete and without renovation. Norya decided to support him financially. As a result, Norya is requesting a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB. She will use the loan to purchase cement and bricks in order to complete the building of the house.

Norya hopes to build the second floor and renovate it.

loans.use: to purchase cement and bricks in order to complete the building of the house

loans.name: Renchinkhand

texts.en: Renchinkhand, 29 years old, lives with her husband and son in Kherlen, the easternmost town of Mongolia. She has been working as a cook at a Chinese restaurant since 2008. Her husband renders taxi service to local people. She is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as steel, bricks and cement for garage renovation. During winter time, due to a bad quality garage, the car her family uses wastes lots of fuel and emits tons of smoke into the atmosphere. So she wants to renovate her garage and make it a better room for her car.

loans.use: to renovate the garage

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for school tuition, and to buy more educational materials and a computer for her daughter

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a current franchisee with Fresh Life Limited. Her franchise has been doing so well in the recent past it created the need to build additional facilities.

Esther seeks a loan to help her purchase and run one more Fresh Life Toilet. She aims to further spread proper sanitation in the Mukuru slums and have members of her community live a comfortable life. She hopes that her new franchise will be as successful as the current one in order to have a well sanitized community.

loans.use: to purchase and run one Fresh Life Toilet

loans.name: Gurezgul

texts.en:
Gurezgul is a careful mother of 8 children. She is married and her husband is a security guard. His salary is not enough to provide a big family with all the necessary things, so Gurezgul has decided to start her own business and in this way to help her husband. She is going to set up a business in animal husbandry. With this aim she took part in a course entitled ‘To Get Ahead’ at a women's organization, and she received a certificate. 

Now she needs financial support, so Gurezgul is asking for a loan of 2,000 Somoni (TJS) to buy cattle to set up her new business. 

She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy cattle for a new business

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Due to the hardship of living, Juliet engages in buying and reselling used clothes within her community. She is 34 years old and blessed with four children. With her husband, they aim to become financially stable in order to give their children a better life. She wants to improve her business but she has limited capital. For this reason, she wants to ask for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy more stock of used clothes, bed sheets and bags to sell. She is hoping that someday she will make more improvements in the business through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more stock of used clothes, bed sheets and bags to sell

location.town: Brgy. Malasin, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Victorine's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de quatre personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, Victorine (dont la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 35 ans n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Victorine est mariée à un chauffeur du nom de Léonard. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Victorine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Il y a environ quinze ans que Victorine mène comme activité la vente des fruits dans sa région. Victorine exerce cette activité passionnément, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Victorine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Victorine sollicite un deuxième crédit avec les autres membres de son groupe. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Le crédit précédent a été bien remboursé
texts.en:
This group is made up of four women who all live in the same neighbourhood in Benin.  Victorine (seen with her hand raised in the photo) is the group respresentative.  She is 35 years old and has never attended school.  She is married to a driver called Leonard and the couple live with their two children, who both attend school.  Between them, Victorine and Leonard provide for all the expenses of their household.

Around fifteen years ago, Victorine started selling fruit in her region.  She is a very active retailer and is able to pay for her needs and also those of her children.  She buys her produce from a market in Benin.  In order to respond better to the demands of their customers, Victorine and the other members of the group work with the field partner,  this will be their second group loan.  The previous loan was fully and correctly repaid.  The group will use their loan to improve their businesses, satisfy their customers and increase their profits.

loans.use: to buy fruit for resale.

loans.name: Shikhali

texts.en:
Shikhali is a 44-year-old refugee. He is married and has two sons and two daughters. His wife is a housekeeper and they live in an IDP settlement. He is a gardener and has raised seasonal fruits (apples, cherries, pears, etc.) and vegetables for 22 years. He sells his harvest at a local bazaar and gets 220 AZN monthly for this.

Gardening is in high demand in Azerbaijan because people have a high demand for fresh fruits and vegetables. They use fruits to make fresh juice and use vegetables to cook national dishes.

Shikali’s income doesn’t cover the family’s demands and he applied for a 1200 AZN loan in order to supply new kinds of fruit trees and grow them. He wants to diversify his assortment of groceries and increase his income.

loans.use: to supply new kinds of fruit trees and grow them

loans.name: Abra Akossiwa

texts.fr:
Abra est une jeune femme célibataire de 26ans. Elle est mère de deux enfants respectivement âgés de trois et cinq ans.  Seule, Abra travaille dure pour subvenir à ses besoins. 

Elle effectue son commerce de manière ambulante  et demande un prêt de 250000FCFA en vue de s’approvisionner  des bazins au grand marché de Lomé. 

Comme perspective d’avenir, Abra aimerait disposer des fonds propres nécessaires pour son installation. Elle a pour ambition d’assurer une bonne éducation à  ses enfants .
texts.en:
Abra is a 26-year-old, single woman, with two children (three years old and five years old).  She works very hard in order to provide for her family.  She buys damask fabric from the main market in Lomé and sells it on foot.

Abra has requested a loan of 250,000 francs CFA in order to buy more stock.  In the future, she would like to have enough money to set up a shop.  Her biggest ambition is to provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy damask fabric for resale.

loans.name: Srey's Group

texts.en: Srey, 41, is a villager from the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She is the mother of five children, three of whom are in school. For the sake of her family, two hectares of rice farming and a paid-working job are the main source of her income. She has been in this business for 15 years. Srey has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely and it has enabled her to uplift her lifestyle progressively. Now, she leads a group of four to get a new loan. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for labor costs. She strongly believes that she can gain a higher income better than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Twizerimana Group

texts.fr:
Gédéon  fait partie du groupe Twizerimana et  habite à  Gitega. Il a 45 ans  et est marié  à Dorothée, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants âgés de 6 à 17 ans, dont 4 étudient.

Il fait le commerce de bière  depuis  18  ans. 

Il est à son dix-neuvième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de  bière  à revendre pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Gédéon is a member of the Twizerimana Group, and lives in Gitega.  He is 45 years old and married to Dorothée who grows vegetables.  Together they have five children, aged between six and seventeen years old.  Four of their children are currently attending school.

Gédéon has been selling beer for eighteen years now.  This will be his nineteenth loan with the field partner, Turame.  He plans to use his loan to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of beer for resale.  In this way, Gédéon hopes to improve his earnings.

loans.use: to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of beer for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy drinks for resale.

loans.name: Maria Azucena

texts.es: María tiene 46 años y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 18 años de edad. María se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos desde hace 5 años, de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir una pila con su respectiva galera. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo, lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en:
Maria, 46, lives in her own home with her husband and 18-year-old son.  She raises and sells chickens and has been in business for five years, earning a living this way to support the household.

Maria is requesting a loan through FUSAI because she wants to build a sink area in her kitchen.  She will use the loan to buy cement, sand, bricks, metal sheeting and wood.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, bricks, metal sheeting and wood to build a sink area in her kitchen.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy charcoal, drinks yams and various other products for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy telephone charge cards, conserves and biscuits for resale.

loans.name: Luz Adilia

texts.es:
El sauce es un pequeño Municipio donde existen personas emprendedoras, con deseo de superar en su vida, y deseo de vivir en mejores condiciones.

Luz Adilia se llama la señora de 61 años de edad, trabaja en el Minsa como cocinera hospitalaria, no cuenta con hijos bajo su cargo, con lo poco que ella gana a duras penas ayuda a mantener el sustento diario de su hogar, su esposo desempeña el cargo de albañil, el apoya en la mejora de su vivienda. 

Son de sus deseos llegar a tener mejores condiciones en su hogar, sus principales sueños es llegar a obtener su propia refrigeradora para después de llegar de un día cansado de su trabajo lograr a tomarse un refresco bien Eladito. 

Se siente a gusto ser asalariada, pero su salario no le da para poder tener mejores condiciones en su vivienda, por lo que tomo la decisión de solicitarle a Kiva y Ceprodel un pequeño crédito para la compra de una Refrigeradora, ayudando a mejorar las condiciones de su familia. 

 
Ella considera que esto sería de gran importancia por lo que ayuda a mantener con mejor cuido los alimentos y mantener una mejor vida saludable, para así seguir rindiendo más en su trabajo.
texts.en:
El Sauce is a small town with local entrepreneurs whose desire it is to get ahead and enjoy better living conditions.  Luz Adilia, 61, works as a cook in the Minsa hospital.  She has no children in her care and with the small salary she earns she can barely cover household expenses.  Her husband works as a bricklayer and helps in home renovation.

She wants to enjoy better living conditions at home and her main desire is to have her own refrigerator so at after arriving home after a long day's work she can enjoy a cold soft drink or ice cream.

Luz Adilia likes her job but she does not earn enough to renovate her house, so she has decided to request a Kiva loan through Ceprodel to buy a refrigerator to help improve her family's conditions.

She believes it is very important to be more careful with food and live a healthy lifestyle so she can continue to work.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es: Marco de 52 años de edad vive junto a su grupo familiar; el se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, el comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, el quiere invertir en insumos agrícolas pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas herramienta, etc. está seguro que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Marco, 52, lives with his family and earns a living in agriculture, specifically growing corn.  He has many years of experience in this sector which have allowed him to obtain better harvests.  His cropland is in an agricultural area and he sells his produce in all the neighboring communities to fixed clientele who prefer his quality, low prices and unequaled customer service.

He wants to invest in farm supplies but needs capital to do so.  So he is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, fertilizers, tools, etc.  He is confident he can pay the loan back on time and also confident that he will be able to give his family the life they deserve.

loans.use: To buy seeds, compost, insecticide, fertilizers, tools, etc.

loans.name: Alamzar

texts.en:
Alamzar is 46 years old and married with a daughter and three sons. They are refugees and live in an IDP settlement. Her husband is a teacher at kindergarten but earnings from this job aren’t enough and the main source of income for family is farming. 

Almazar raises and sells seasonal vegetables such as pumpkin, cucumber, potatoes and so on. She has been raising them and selling at the local bazaar for 24 years and has good experience in this area. Her monthly income is 200AZN.

Vegetables are in high demand in Azerbaijan because people like to use them for fresh salads and delicious national dishes. They go to local groceries to buy fresh and tasty vegetables. They know that vegetables raised in private gardens are always fresh and without pesticides.

Almazar needs money to cover the family’s demands. She applied for 1500AZN in order to purchase quality fertilizers to increase her harvest and income.This is her fourth loan and she has a good client history.

loans.use: to purchase quality fertilizers and increase her harvest.

loans.name: Loretta

texts.en:
Loretta is a 49-years-old married woman with 9 children. She has a small business selling pancakes to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. Loretta has requested a loan to buy a large frying pan, cooking oil, bags of sugar, bags of flour, yeast and plastic bags. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. 

With her profits, Loretta hopes to expand her business in other nearby villages.

loans.use: to buy a large frying pan, cooking oil, bags of sugar, bags of flour, yeast and plastic bags.

loans.name: Kaisarina

texts.en:
Kaisarina is 24 years old and has been with her partner for 1 year with 1 child. She wants to start a small business making and selling meat buns in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy chicken, garlic, onion, soy sauce, containers, frying pan and a large pot.

In the future,Kaisarina hopes to improve her business. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy chicken, garlic, onion, soy sauce, containers, frying pan and a large pot.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
La socia Mery se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de boletos turísticos a las diferentes personas del extranjero y también personas nacionales, el socio vende boletos para diferentes lugares como machupicchu y valle sagrado, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5 p.m, el socio ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es tener una agencia de viajes. El socio solicita le crédito para comprar boletos turísticos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mery continues working as a tourism agent, selling tourist packages to places such as Machu Picchu and the Sacred Valley to both national and international tourists.   She works from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. and has been in business for five years, with very good results.

Her dream is to have her own travel agency.  She is requesting this loan to buy tourist tickets.

She is very grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to buy tour tickets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seeds, compost, insecticide, fertilizers, tools, etc. and to improve his cropland.

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.es:
La socia Eleuteria se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eleuteria, a member of Asociación Arariwa, is still selling food. She prepares different dishes, such as roasted chicken, soups and meat stews. She works from 08:00 am until 06:00 pm. She has been doing this for eight years and is doing very well. Her dream is to own a restaurant.

Eleuteria is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as rice, vegetables and chicken. She feels happy with this loan and promises to pay the installments according to plan.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Julia Gladis

texts.es:
Julia, como jefa de su hogar es la que realiza los esfuerzos por mantenerse trabajando y así cubrir las necesidades de su familia, Julia es madre soltera, vive con dos de sus hijos, ellos están estudiando, ella es graduada de la Universidad como maestra, pero no ejerce su carrera ya que se siente mucho más satisfecha atendiendo su negocio de elaboración de recuerdos para eventos especiales y venta de flores (artificiales y naturales), tiene 25 años de poseerlo.
El crédito lo invertiré en la compra de alambre, papel, espelma, listones, copas, pegamento, flores naturales, oasis, espuma, entre otros accesorios necesarios para elaborar sus arreglos florales, espera contar con la satisfacción de sus clientes.
Para Julia es importante mantenerse trabajando pues desea dar el apoyo necesario a sus hijos para que finalicen una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Julia, as head of the household, works hard in order to cover the family’s expenses. Julia is a single mother that lives with two of her children, who go to school. Julia is a certified teacher, but she does not practice because she likes to take care of her own business. She makes keepsakes for special events and sells flowers (both artificial and natural). She has been doing this for twenty-five years.

She will use this loan to buy wire, paper, wax, ribbons, cups, glue, flowers and floral foam, among other things she needs to make flower arrangements. She hopes to make her customers happy.

Julia thinks it is very important to have this job, because she wants to give her children all the support they need to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy wire, paper, glue, floral foam and other materials she needs to make flower arrangements.

loans.name: Gerardo De Jesus

texts.es: Gerardo de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia el se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene mucha clientela por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Gerardo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas herramienta, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía y asi continuar con sus cultivos para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Gerardo is 33 years old, lives in his own house with his family and dedicates his time to growing corn. He has a lot of clients because of the high quality of his products and good prices. With the money he makes from his sales, he looks to pay off his household expenses.

Gerardo is requesting a loan for the purchase of seed, compost, insecticide, fertiliser, pest control tools, etc. to improve the land shown in the photo. In this way he hopes to keep growing his crops and providing a better quality of life for his family without any limitations.

loans.use: purchase of seed, compost, insecticide, fertiliser, pest control tools, etc.

loans.name: Ceferino Idelfonso De Jesús

texts.es:
Ceferino es una persona de 26 años de edad que se dedica a la prestación de servicios como albañil,  él  vivió y se creció con sus abuelos quienes se dedicaron toda su vida a realizar los trabajos de agricultura y los oficios domésticos de su hogar, su abuela era una persona muy humilde y trabajadora y fue ella quien le enseño buenos valores morales y espirituales, y de esta forma poniendo en práctica todo la aprendido ha podido salir adelante. 

Él aprendió este oficio de su abuelo quien se dedicaba a la albañilería, luego participo en un curso de albañiles y fue allí donde aprendió y adquirió experiencia en dicho trabajo.  Transcurrió el tiempo y él formo su hogar, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su casa se preocupa por mantener su casa con la salud e higiene,  ya que lo más importante para ella son su familia. 


Él se dedica a la prestación de servicios de albañil en su comunidad y su esposa vende en un cafetín que está ubicado en el centro escolar de su comunidad,  que es de su propiedad también se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar, esta labor la aprendió de su abuela quien dedicó toda su vida a realizar los oficios domésticos de su hogar, y ella continua haciéndolo porque le enorgullece que sus hijos se sientan cómodos estando en su casa.

El dinero será utilizado, para comprar golosinas, bebidas, refrescos, frutas, verduras, pan, etc, para el cafetín.  De esta forma tendrán mejores ganancias económicas que le servirán para invertirlas en el mejorar el suministro de agua potable de su casa, ya que por la época de lluvias que se acerca es necesario que el pozo con el que cuentan tenga techo y este protegido.


Las planes que él tiene para un futuro son las de ampliar y mejorar su casa donde tiene planeado poner una venta de granos básicos y productos de primera necesidad y apoyara la formación y educación de su hijo hasta que sea un profesional graduado. Con la ayuda de un nuevo préstamo invertirá en compra de un vehículo para hacer viajes.
texts.en:
Ceferino is a 26 year old person who works as a bricklayer. He grew up and lived with his grandparents who spent their whole lives working in agriculture and in the home. His grandmother was a very humble and hardworking and she was the one who taught him good moral and spiritual values. By putting everything he learned into practice, he has been able to get ahead.  

He learned his grandfather's trade, which was bricklaying. Later he participated in a bricklaying course and that is how he learned and acquired experience in that work. Time passed and he started his family. His wife takes care of the home and is in charge of the house, health and hygiene, as the most important thing for her is the family.  

He works as a bricklayer in his community and his wife works in a cafe that is located in the school in their community. She is the owner and she also continues to take care of the home, because she is proud that their children are comfortable in the house.  

The money will be used to buy snacks, drinks, juices, vegetables, bread, etc., for the cafe. This way, he will have more income which will be used to invest in improving the supply if potable water in his house. During the rainy season, which is near, the well they have needs to have a roof and be protected.


The plans he has for the future are to expand and improve the house. He is planning on selling basic grains and staple products, supporting the raising and education of his son until he graduates from college. With the help of a new loan, he will invest in buying a a vehicle to make trips with.

loans.use: to buy snacks, beverages, juices, fruit, vegetables, bread, etc. for his cafe.

loans.name: Tsevegsuren

texts.en:
Mrs. Tsevegsuren, 30 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She and her husband have been rendering taxi service to local people since 2010. Actually, her husband is a construction worker, but due to the mining industry stagnation, he was laid off. 

She is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy potato seeds to grow potatoes in large quantities. 

Planting potatoes early will result in a larger harvest output in the autumn. After the harvest, she wants to sell potatoes to local people at wholesale prices in order to meet other needs. Growing vegetables helps in environmental protection through its process, called photosynthesis.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds.

loans.name: Gulnisa

texts.en:
Gulnisa is a 47-year-old married refugee with a son and three daughters. Her husband is a laborer. The family lives in an IDP settlement, and the main source of income is gardening. 

Gunisa has been raising and selling seasonal fruits (cherries, pears, cherry-plum) and beautiful roses for 15 years, and has a good practice in this area. Her monthly income is 210 AZN.

Azerbaijan people have high demands for fresh fruit. They prepare fruit salads, fresh juice, and jam for tea. Local people know Gulnisa, and she knows their demands. She sells fresh fruit for a cheap price because she knows that refugees don’t earn enough money.

Gulnisa needs to increase her monthly income, cover her big family’s needs, and pay for her children’s education. 

She applied for a 1,500 AZN loan in order to build a greenhouse for the garden, and to purchase fertilizer. This will increase the productivity of the harvest,  and her income.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse for a garden, and to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Maria Estela

texts.es: María tiene 26 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 4 años de edad. María se dedica a la prestación de servicios básicos desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como apoya con la economía de su hogar. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una champa que le permita acomodar mejor a su familia. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera. Espero poder contar con el financiamiento que le permita mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales lo antes posible.
texts.en: María is 26 years old. She lives in her own home with her life's companion and their 4 year old son. María has worked offering basic services for a long time and that is how she helps the household budget. María is asking for this FUSAI loan to invest in building a shed which will allow her to accommodate her family better. With the amount she has asked for, she will buy galvanized sheeting and wood. She hopes to have the loan, which will allow her to improve her living conditions, as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to build a shed.

loans.name: Ainel

texts.en:
Ainel, a father of two, operates his own farm for a living. After two years of farming, he and his wife earn well to provide for the family. 

He was working in his farm while taking responsiblity in feeding their large cattle, so he could sell them in the future. His wife also takes care of their pigs, in addition to her household chores.

Ainel borrowed a loan to purchase fertilizer, such as manure, in order to improve the farm as they have planned.

 It is their main source of income, so he had to ensure to gain more harvest in the near future. 

He wants to ensure a better home, and improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, such as manure

loans.name: Risper

texts.en:
Meet Risper, a farmer based in the Kitale area of north rift Kenya; she lives with her husband and five children. She has been farming for the past five years, with her primary income source being a variety of crops and eggs. 

She enjoys farming because of the proceeds she gets out of selling her farm produce. Her biggest challenges are a lack of enough funds, as well as the pests and diseases affecting her crops and livestock.

Risper took a loan for expanding her poultry farm, which she says will lead to food security for her family.  

She will sell more eggs in order to get more income, thus she will be able to take her children to good schools.

loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Aine

texts.en:
Aine has been selling  farm products in their village, in addition to selling it in town. She supplies fruits and vegetables in the market which she acquired from her neighbor, too. Her three children were still studying, and she had to earn to support their needs. 

Aine borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy seedlings and organic fertilizer. 

She wants to expand her farm to ensure a better source of income for her children. She hopes to have a better living situation in the future.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and organic fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy articles.

loans.name: Musalam

texts.en:
Musalam was born in 1958. She lives and works in South Tajikistan. 

Her activity is selling food items. Musalam began this business 10 years ago. During 10 years she has been busy with selling food items in a food shop. She sells candies, biscuits, milk products, butter, meat products, etc. Her shop is located in the center of the region, so there is a great demand for food items in her shop. 

Musalam now is going to increase working capital. She is asking for a loan of 3,000 Somoni to buy food items for increasing working capital. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy food items for her market.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza, a mother of nine, operates a general store to make a living. Aside from this, she also vends snacks to earn extra income while her husband works as a construction worker. 

She has sustained the business for ten years. She earns to support the needs of her children. 

She borrowed a loan from GDMPC to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. She hopes to improve the business to ensure a better source of income for the family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Nigoroy

texts.en:
Nigoroy is married and has four children. Nigoroy is a person who always tries to earn money and provide a better life to her children. 

She began her own business dealing in animal husbandry when her children were little. She mainly feeds cows. Nigoroy sells cows in a local market. She requested a loan in the amount of 10,000 somoni to increase the number of animals she has for sale. She hopes for Kiva's cooperation in this loan since it will be used to improve her family's income.

loans.use: To buy animals to sell.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is requesting a new loan to buy a range of rices to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. 

Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increasing sales, and that it will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater quantity of rice to stock her store.

loans.name: Elynor

texts.en:
Elynor lives at Baggao with her spouse and two children. She had seven children in all but the rest are already married and live separately. She raises hogs to sell as a business. Her spouse is a farmer, growing both rice and corn. 

In her hog-raising business, Elynor earns about P2,000 each time she sells a hog. She uses her income as working capital in her business and another part of it is used for daily expenses at home. 

She is now asking for additional working capital amounting to  P5,000 to buy feed and vaccines for her hogs. This will help the hogs grow healthier, and she will able to sell them at a higher price someday.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her hogs

loans.name: Levaea

texts.en:
Levaea is 28 years old, married, and has two children. She makes and sells elei (painted fabric) materials to earn a living and has been doing this for two years.
